programme.title: The Sudheide - Woods, meadows, open country
programme.desc: Forests and fields, moors and heathland, shepherds and sheep - these are the symbols of an ostensibly unspoilt landscape that has inspired poets and painters alike for centuries. The secret of the almost 500 km² nature reserve Naturpark Sudheide lies in its diversity: the origins of its soil, geology and topography can be traced back to the ice age. But the region between Hamburg and Hannover is anything but unspoilt. For centuries, it was synonymous with heathland farmers and formed as a North German cultivated landscape. This documentary tells of an almost unknown region, which has been strongly influenced by mankind for centuries, yet still remains diverse in its nature. Nature...

programme.title: Moksgmol - The Quest for the Spirit Bear
programme.desc: A forest that lives off fish, a white bear that is not a polar bear, and wolves that feed off the ocean… Canada’s Great Bear Rain Forest is a strange and pristine world, a land that time almost forgot. The awe-inspiring northern coastline of British Columbia with its great fjords that rival those in Norway, is the habitat of numerous species and the scene for the amazing co-existence of wolves, ravens, salmon, bears and a mystical rainforest, whose lives are intricately intertwined…

programme.title: Bear Essentials
programme.desc: We follow three young bears of different species – polar bears, brown bears and sloth bears (like Baloo, the Jungle Book Bear) – that inhabit dramatically varied landscapes as they find their way in the world. We look at how their mothers teach them the skills they need to survive and watch the many dangers they face. Their young lives are full of learning, moments of great tenderness and life-threatening drama. Over three years all of our bears, despite hardships and losses along the way, prove they have what it takes, they all have learned their bear essentials.

programme.title: Search for the Ghost Bears
programme.desc: Our film journey begins in Alaskas west. We are hoping to find glacier bears in the glacial regions of the Katmai National Park on the Douglas River. At the end of July, brown bears have now arrived to fish for salmon. In the surrounding forests, grizzlies look for berries and fresh, green twigs. The Katmai is Alaskas most volcanic area, and with 15 active volcanoes it is a veritable powder keg, surrounded by glaciers. In the Hook glacier region moose and lynx accompany us. Bald eagles have arrived at the glacial boundary and begin to tear apart their freshly caught prey. At last, we catch sight of a glacier bear. Hungry, he has left the ice region and has been forced down here in...

programme.title: Leap Of The Lynx
programme.desc: On the Iberian Peninsula, primeval landscapes are practically non-existent, so the Iberian lynx has lived on cultivated land for centuries – cattle, horse and pig pastures, cork oak forests, timberland, and even holy sites of pilgrimage. The diversity and beauty of these locations are truly stunning and their character and history as relevant to this story as that of the big cat itself. Until five years ago, both populations of Iberian lynx were quickly fading away. Their fragmented habitats were shrinking even further, they were starved by lack of prey and reduced by epidemics. But now, local authorities, scientists, landowners, and other groups have finally begun to act in unison.

programme.title: Secret Life Of Deer
programme.desc: 30 million white-tailed deer live in the United States. They have begun to adapt themselves to living in a world of traffic, pets and backyards. In Cayuga Heights, New York, the suburb’s residents are trying to get used to this exceptional living arrangement. The deer can be spotted daily from kitchen windows and porches. Life in the suburbs is deer heaven – large areas of grass, no predators and plenty of water means their population is on a steady rise. In this documentary, white-tailed deer are outfitted with special cameras to take the viewer into their world. Deercam allows us to see them in a new light – not frozen in the headlights of a car or as shy residents of the woods, but...

programme.title: The Moose Detective
programme.desc: Moose are an iconic species and of great importance to Sweden. That is why the country counts on a very special expert - the moose detective. Recently, a problem has developed on Öland regarding its moose. For a few years now on the island, the moose calves have been dying shortly after birth. Its a mystery. Every effort is made to save them. The island has called upon the moose detective to investigate. He follows several leads. Soon one of the suspects is identified - climate change. But it is not easy to convict the culprit. There are other suspects as well, the food shortage for example. Maybe they have joined hands as accomplices. In Sweden moose are very important. They are game...

programme.title: The Beavers are back
programme.desc: The return of the beavers is one of the greatest success stories of nature conservation in Germany. Hunted for a long time and almost exterminated, today more than 35.000 beavers live in Germany again – and the trend is rising. But how did this happen? One gets to see the mostly nocturnal animals only rarely. Klaus WeiSSmann has spent more than two years tracking down the shy beavers and documenting their spread in Germany. Which ways do they use? What dangers are they exposed to? Step by step, this film tells the exciting and sometimes odd success story of the likeable rodents.

programme.title: Rewilding: Back to Nature
programme.desc: Worldwide, there are various projects and approaches to give nature more space again. The aim is to create larger wilderness areas that develop with hardly any influence of humans - by reintroducing so-called key animal species and creating a network of wilderness corridors across entire continents. Rewilding promises to be a cost-effective form of conservation in which we can boost biodiversity and protect the climate.

programme.title: The Secret of Migrating Birds - Tryst at the Red Sea
programme.desc: Each year in spring, Israel witnesses a unique spectacle. Many millions of migrating birds cross the land bridge between Africa, Asia and Europe.Their first major roosting place after an exhausting nonstop flight over the African deserts is in southern Israel – a vital stopover. Here they replenish their energy reserves. The flocks of migrating birds are pursued by flocks of ornithologists. Hundreds of birders flood into the port city of Eilat on the Red Sea to take part in the Migration Festival. For a week, Israels southernmost coastal resort is home to international scientists and amateur birders.

programme.title: King of the Mountains - Golden Eagle
programme.desc: Aerial shots of mating Golden eagles, a clash between a Golden and a White-tailed eagle, and an intimate glimpse into their nesting grounds combine to create a spectacular film. Tracking these majestic birds reveals the wild nature of their hunting grounds, showcasing the diverse animal and plant life that share their habitat with the king of the skies. Viewers are brought up close as the eagle effortlessly glides over forests and canyons, abruptly diving in a breathtaking pursuit of prey. Witnessing these birds in their natural habitats is witnessing them at their finest. Embark on a magnificent journey through the skies and landscapes with us.

programme.title: King of the Seas - Sea Eagle
programme.desc: The times where eagles have been seen as varmints are over. They are now perceived as an integral part of the food cycle. Due to the fact that the habitats of the sea eagles in Germany are largely found in the north-eastern regions that are rich in water, the movie accompanies the eagles to an island, home to hundreds of sea ravens, where they rob the baby sea ravens of their food. They seem to always profit from the successes of the fellow creatures in their habitats. This film introduces you to the expert poachers of the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Cuckoo - The Enemy in My Nest
programme.desc: It’s no news that cuckoos are brood parasites: they lay their eggs into the nests of other bird species – a clever trick that spares the rearing of own offspring. Some even go as far as to kill the other chicks in the nest. But why do other parent birds let this happen? Are they too stupid? Too inept? Or simply clueless? Admittedly, cuckoo’s eggs do look deceptively genuine. But the cuckoo chick? Not even remotely! It quickly grows into a giant that looks nothing like its new family. So why don’t the adoptive parents notice the sham then? Until recently, the ornithologists’ theory was: the “victims” have yet to learn to counteract. Turns out: they may even profit from having strangers’...

programme.title: Snowy Owl: Queen of the North
programme.desc: No other owls are capable of surviving the extreme conditions, whereas the snowy owl is able to hunt through six months of bright sunshine and six months of twilight. This film follows a pair of snowy owls as they breed on the tundra of the High Arctic, 300 miles inside the Arctic Circle. Lemming numbers are low this year. Five owlets hatch and they face a struggle if any are going to survive.

programme.title: Hummingbirds: Jewelled Messengers
programme.desc: Hummingbirds live at the limits of what is possible. They have the highest metabolism with a heart rate of 1,200 beats per minute of any vertebrate. Their wings beat 50 times a second. They can hover on the spot, and even fly backwards. To our eyes, they are just a blur. But with the aid of high-speed cameras we can slow down their hyperactive lives and look into their secret world.

programme.title: Moksgmol - The Quest for the Spirit Bear
programme.desc: A forest that lives off fish, a white bear that is not a polar bear, and wolves that feed off the ocean… Canada’s Great Bear Rain Forest is a strange and pristine world, a land that time almost forgot. The awe-inspiring northern coastline of British Columbia with its great fjords that rival those in Norway, is the habitat of numerous species and the scene for the amazing co-existence of wolves, ravens, salmon, bears and a mystical rainforest, whose lives are intricately intertwined…

Viewers are brought up close as the eagle effortlessly glides over forests and canyons, abruptly diving in a breathtaking pursuit of prey. Witnessing these birds in their natural habitats is witnessing them at their finest. Embark on a magnificent journey through the skies and landscapes with us.

programme.title: Bosnia Herzegovina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bosnia and Herzegovina: The Abundant North
programme.desc: Wild and unknown lies the still undiscovered natural paradise of Bosnia and Herzegovina in the heart of Europe. Rough mountains, dense forests and wild waterfalls characterize the picture of the untouched landscapes. Lynx, wolves and bears roam mountains and valleys. One of the last primeval forests in Europe is a retreat for many endangered animal species. Bosnia and Herzegovina is actually an undiscovered natural paradise in the middle of Europe.

programme.title: Bosnia Herzegovina
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Bosnia and Herzegovina: The Karstic South
programme.desc: The barren, karstic south of the country, Herzegovina, also impresses with its natural landscapes. One of them is the Livno field. Not only is it the largest wetland in the country, it is also the largest regularly flooded karst field in the world. About 700 wild horses live in this unique landscape. Their ancestors were working horses that were abandoned here more than 50 years ago. Another special feature of the karst landscape are the rivers with their tufa barriers. The countless waterfalls that pour over it are a unique natural phenomenon.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: The Parque Nacional Peneda-Geres is the only national park in Portugal. An area of almost 700 square kilometers, located in the extreme north of Portugal. Barren and rocky ridges in the plateaus, contrast with large forests and lush ground vegetation in deep valleys, crossed by lakes and rivers. The park is known for its oak forests, which are predominantly pedunculate and Pyrenean oaks. Among the typical animals of the park are the small Garrano ponies, a very old breed of horse and the only one in Europe that still lives in the wild.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: The highest mountain range in Portugal is the Serra da Estrela. The episode embarks on a voyage of discovery to adventurous rock formations and villages steeped in tradition. The nature park is the largest protected area on the Iberian peninsula. In the mountain range we accompany the young scientist Ana Matos, who wants to breathe new life into old traditions, and cheese maker Maria Natália Lopes. She watches over more than 350 sheeps.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 South West Portugal: Alentejano and Costa Vicentina
programme.desc: In the southwest of Portugal lies the little known Parque Natural do Sudoeste Alentejano e Costa Vicentina. It encompasses a narrow coastal strip that runs along the coast to the south of Portugal. Sparsely populated, this coastal region, which was placed under protection in 1988, is considered one of the last intact ecosystems in Europe. The steep cliffs, the almost constant wind and high waves have ensured that mass tourism has not gained a foothold here. There are still near-natural forests and a diverse bird life.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: Madeira - Portugals autonomous island in the Atlantic Ocean, is closer to the African coast than to the mother country Portugal, from which it is separated by about 900 kilometers. The islands name comes from Portuguese sailors who claimed the uninhabited isle for themselves in 1419. Madeira means wood and that was available in abundance. Almost the entire surface was covered by dense forest. Since 1982, two-thirds of the landscape has been protected.

programme.title: Portugals Nature Parks
programme.desc: The "Parque Natural da Ria Formosa" is one of the largest lagoon conservation areas in Europe. Bordered by five natural islands. A mosaic of sandbanks, brackish and freshwater lagoons and salt marshes. In 2010, the "Ria Formosa" was chosen as one of the seven natural wonders of Portugal. It is a unique ecosystem: in the winter months, more than 20,000 birds gather here. In addition, the nature park has one of the largest seahorse populations internationally. More than half of all fish species in the Atlantic are said to spawn in the lagoon.

programme.title: Wild Baltic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Wild Baltic - Life on the Amber Coast
programme.desc: The first episode of this two-part nature documentary presents the natural beauty of the shifting sand dunes of the Curonian Spit, the romantic beaches of the Latvian Baltic Sea and the island worlds of Estonia. Time and again, this deserted and almost untouched nature fascinates. In the winter, ringed seals give birth to their young on the pack ice. In the spring, Konik wild horse stallions fight fierce battles amongst themselves, while colourful European rollers fly through the dune forests. Lynxes wander through the coastal forests and in the orchid meadows turncoats and hoopoes find more than enough food. On the islands around Saaremaa in Estonia, grey seals hunt for fish. They share...

programme.title: Wild Baltic
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wild Baltic - Enchanted Forests and Moors
programme.desc: The wide, often untouched wilderness of the Baltic hinterland is home to many animals. More than 35 brown bears live in the primeval forests of Alutaguse. In the spring, the Soomaa National Park transforms into a huge lake. Europes widest waterfall is located in Latvia. In the beginning of May, vimba bream follow the course of the River Venta. The hardly 5-centimetre-long fish have to overcome a 4-metre-long rock barrier in order to reach their spawning grounds.

programme.title: Wild Bavaria
programme.desc: The moon disappears behind the horizon and the stage is set for a new day in the Alps of Berchtesgaden.

programme.title: Wild Bavaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Wild Bavaria - In The Shadow of the Watzmann.
programme.desc: Mighty and mysterious, King Watzmann sits above Germanys only alpine national park.

programme.title: Wilderness in Europe: The Bohemian Forest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Psychogramm of a Spiritual Landscape
programme.desc: The Bohemian Forest is the source of the Vltava River, home to primeval forests, untouched high moors and bubbling torrents. This archaic stretch of land, which includes the Bavarian Forest, was long considered impenetrable and mysterious. Since the fall of the Iron Curtain, Bavarian border residents have rediscovered new references to this unusual forest landscape for themselves. This is also the case with photo artist Bastian Kalous, who has been documenting his homeland for years with nostalgic-looking Polaroid photographs and is dealing with its eventful history for an illustrated book. Or Elisa Belotti and Marco Heurich, who have dedicated their lives to the lynxes. In order for...

programme.title: Wilderness in Europe: The Bohemian Forest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Boundary Experiences in Muhlviertel
programme.desc: Pavel Hubeny, whose life would be unthinkable without the forest, is the head of the Šumava National Park. He is committed to ensuring that a primeval forest can grow for future generations, in which man does not interfere. This vision of a primeval forest is also shared by the forester Claus Bassler, who wants to counteract the extinction of species by having trees felled to create artificial deadwood and thus a new habitat for rare beetles and fungi. On the Vltava River lies the small town of Krumlov, the "Pearl of the Bohemian Forest" with its Baroque theater and fully preserved stage technology from the 17th century. Here the director Zuzana Vrbová enchants people from all over the...

programme.title: Wild River Rhine
programme.desc: Alluvial forests, roaring waterfalls, steep canyons and sunny slopes flank the river Rhine. The variety of habitats is the reason for the large biodiversity along the stream.There is hardly any other river in Germany that is surrounded by as many myths and legends as the river Rhine. No other river has been the topic of songs, has been painted and travelled equally frequently. Despite this it still seems to be true today what the French poet Victor Hugo once said about this river – the Rhine is a river everybody talks about, nobody explores, everybody visits but no one really knows. The film follows the water against the stream. It starts at the river’s delta in the Netherlands, flows...

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bosnia and Herzegovina: The Abundant North

programme.title: Lions On The Move
programme.desc: Kevin Richardson shares an extraordinary bond with Africa’s most fearsome predators. Together with them, he has experienced some real adventures. However, transporting 27 lions and 14 hyenas to a new home presents a different challenge.The lions new home will be a sanctuary on the edge of Dinokeng, a South African game reserve spanning 18,000 square metres. The huge task ahead includes planning and designing the new enclosures, and securing permits to move the animals.

programme.title: Lions On The Move
programme.desc: Not only are the animals regularly rotated into new enclosures to prevent repetitive behaviour developing out of boredom, but Kevin also has to practice loading them in and out of the van. Can the reluctant lions and hyenas eventually be persuaded to get on board with the move?

programme.title: Africanews
programme.desc: Africanews is the only independent national and international news channel from an African perspective. It reports breaking news from the continent, delivers unbiased reporting and is available on TV and digital platforms.

programme.title: I Got a Monster: Americas Most Corrupt Police Squad
programme.desc: Retells in highly dramatic fashion one of the USAs biggest police corruption scandals. In 2017, Baltimore was rocked by the Federal indictment of Wayne Jenkins, a highly decorated supercop and leader of the Baltimore Police Departments elite Gun Trace Task Force along with six other members on racketeering charges.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: Closing arguments begin. But not before two of the more remarkable moments in this remarkable case. Two Mafia hitmen - in the federal witness protection program testify - on behalf of O.J. Simpson.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: The verdict comes back with lightning speed. Some are shocked. Some overjoyed. But why did it turn out the way that it did? We take you inside the jury room and show you.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Ten years after being found guilty of the murder of her husband, Susie Mowbrays conviction was overturned, and she would once again face a jury of her peers.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: While under the influence of drugs and alcohol, Chante Mallard struck pedestrian Gregory Biggs with her car, impaling him in the windshield.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: In 1986, an American becomes one of Canadas most prolific bank and jewellery bandits after he pulls off one of the biggest heists in Canadian history.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: Police are able to capture kidnappers when the assailants use their victims cell phone.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: Two murders of mothers in their own homes send shock-waves through a normally quiet and friendly town where everybody leaves their doors unlocked.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: 1995 - Houston, Texas. A lonely man calls a dating service and gets more than he bargained for when he is met at gunpoint and robbed by his "dates".

programme.desc: Scott Amendure thought the Jenny Jones Show was the perfect place to reveal to his friend Jonathan Schmitz that he had a crush on him.

programme.desc: Codi is suprised to see the drooling over food made by Pokibot! But Codi thinks theres something missing from Pokibots dishes... Lets check out the Cook-off between Codi and Pokibot! Who is going to be the winner of this showdown? Pinkfong and Hogi have a little argue for the first time! Pinkfongs broken power glove has ripped off Hogis blueprint for detective agency! Will Pinkfong and Hogi be able to get along again like before?

programme.title: Sing along with Baby Shark
programme.desc: Come join Baby Shark and Shark Family for a fun sing along!

programme.title: Sing along with Baby Shark
programme.desc: Enjoy kids favorite songs with Shark Family sing-along series. Come and join playful Baby Shark!

programme.title: Hide n Seek with Shark Family
programme.desc: Oh? Where did Baby Shark and Shark Family go? Help Pinkfong to find all the Shark Family!

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.desc: Love is the most wonderful of all feelings in this world. On this Valentine’s day, share your love with all your loved ones. With our “Valentine’s Day Sharks” song, have a Love-Filled valentine’s day, everyone!

programme.title: Baby Shark Safety Songs
programme.desc: Learn all about safety with Baby Shark Safety Rangers with fun and educational Safety Songs Compilation.

programme.title: Pinkfongs DIY Guide
programme.desc: Join us and make all sorts of desserts with clay!

programme.title: Baby Shark Party Time
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Baby Shark Party Time
programme.desc: Let’s have a fun sing-along party with Baby Shark! Sing along to Baby Sharkcito!

programme.title: Dance with Pinkfong
programme.desc: You are watching "Dance with Pinkfong!", a super fun nursery rhyme created by Pinkfong. Everybody! Lets sing with Pinkfong.

programme.title: Pinkfongs DIY Guide
programme.desc: PINKFONG Origami is fun and easy, and great for kids’ role-play activities!

programme.title: Lets Color With Pinkfong
programme.desc: Toyrocket, Cupcake, Cake, Icecream, Trumpet, Chocolate, Toyhammer, Tractor, Crayon, Bus

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs for Children
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Pinkfong Climate Change Songs
programme.desc: Help the sea animals from the terrifying plastic animal! Save the environment with Baby Shark!

programme.title: Bebefinn Nursery Rhymes
programme.desc: Baby Shark Doo Doo Doo! Sing with Bebefinn and family!

programme.title: Pinkfong and Hogi’s Magic Adventure
programme.desc: "Once upon a time…There was a huge palace without a king. Only the true king of animals could be the ruler of this palace. Meanwhile, both the bear and the lion had their eyes on the throne. Who will become the true king of animals?"

programme.title: Sing along with Pinkfong and Hogi
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Sing along with Pinkfong and Hogi 5
programme.desc: Come sing along with adorable Pinkfong and Hogi!

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: After the earthquake which almost took his life, Hobie leaves California to live with his mother.

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in a dune buggy race.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and Hobie is pressured into throwing a house party.

programme.title: Shortsighted
programme.desc: Hobie befriends a boy who has moved to California to live with his father after his mothers death.

programme.title: Someone to Baywatch Over You
programme.desc: Mitch helps a woman he calls “The Mermaid” who turns out to be the wife of a crime boss.

programme.title: K-Gas The Grooveyard of Solid Gold
programme.desc: The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: Red Wind
programme.desc: When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach.

programme.title: I Spike
programme.desc: A lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert introduces new technology to the Baywatch team.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 1
programme.desc: Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 2
programme.desc: Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. Father Ryan falls in love with CJ.

programme.title: Rubber Ducky
programme.desc: Logans visa is soon to expire. Can he get his green card before he gets sent back to Australia?

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must rescue her and save the day.

programme.title: Seize the Day
programme.desc: Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she is terminal ill.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover.

programme.title: Fathers Day
programme.desc: Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it.

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Prominent British businessman Richard Branson visits Baywatch to perform several risky stunts.

programme.title: Wet and Wild
programme.desc: Hobie’s idol comes to the beach, but Mitch is furious he turns out to have some questionable morals.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 1
programme.desc: Mitch considers a new career working with Garner as a private eye. Logan cheats on Caroline again.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 2
programme.desc: When a crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, the team begins a desperate rescue effort.

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Kaye asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children.

programme.title: Surfs Up
programme.desc: Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach.

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Mitchs mother arrives in town and, after some strange occurrences, he insists she see a doctor.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina.

programme.title: Face of Fear
programme.desc: Hobies new friend Isaac’s risky behavior causes problems for the lifeguards.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Logan borrows Codys car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heat is
programme.desc: Matt returns to Baywatch and ends up trapped on a yacht with Neely and a group of ruthless pirates.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Logan and Caroline’s relationship hits a new low when Caroline returns his engagement ring.

programme.title: The Incident
programme.desc: Caroline blames herself for a teens death in a fiery nighttime boating accident and gets PTSD.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A mysterious creature begins attacking beachgoers, and it is up to the Baywatch team to find it.

programme.title: Desperate Encounter
programme.desc: Logan must help his friend raise $50,000 to keep her ranch, and Jessie Lee Harris is back to help.

programme.title: Baywatch Angels
programme.desc: Stephanie, Caroline and CJ become Charlie’s Angels in a fun fantasy romp through 70s television.

programme.title: Bash at the Beach
programme.desc: CJ rescues pro wrestler Hulk Hogan, who is in town with Randy Savage to help save a Youth Center.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Mitch is convinced by Stephanies boyfriend Tom to go sky-surfing but things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Sail Away
programme.desc: Stephanie is recruiting lifeguards for the annual Sailing Regatta against South Bay.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Mitch and Caroline rescue a woman who gets amnesia while trying to find her father.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 1
programme.desc: The team is invited to Hawaii for a week to oversee new lifeguard techniques and relax a bit.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 2
programme.desc: After Matt is stung by a poisonous fish they find a village where a young woman offers to help.

programme.title: Last Wave
programme.desc: Kaye is reunited with old flame Wes Masters. Stephanie undergoes surgery for melanoma.

programme.title: Go for the Gold
programme.desc: While in search of underwater treasure, Stephanie and Cody are confronted by drug smugglers.

programme.title: Shark Fever
programme.desc: Logan decides to write and direct a low-budget action film at the beach using a real shark.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: When Mitch Judges the Miss Malibu Beach Bikini Contest his willpower is tested.

programme.title: Liquid Assets
programme.desc: Max, a secretly rich homeless eccentric man, suddenly dies and leaves CJ his fortune.

programme.title: Windswept
programme.desc: At the annual Baywatch Bachelor Auction, Mitch is "bought" for $5,000 by a wealthy socialite.

programme.title: Scorcher
programme.desc: LA is in the throes of a severe heat wave! Hundreds of thousands of people head to the beach.

programme.title: Beachblast
programme.desc: Mitch hires MTV DJ Jenny McCarthy to throw "Beachblast" to raise money for the Special Olympics.

programme.title: Guess Whos Coming to Dinner
programme.desc: CJs mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Australias Uncle Tobys International Ironman Competition sparks a battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Controversy generated by Donnas appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards.

programme.title: Search and Rescue
programme.desc: Fire chief Captain Huntingdon and the Baywatch team form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit.

programme.title: Heal the Bay
programme.desc: The team works with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants onto the beach.

programme.title: Bachelor of the Month
programme.desc: Mitch has been chosen Flash Magazines Bachelor of the Month, which causes some complications.

programme.title: Chance of a Lifetime
programme.desc: Stephanie and Tom go on their honeymoon in a two-mast schooner with a group of troubled teenagers.

programme.title: Talk Show
programme.desc: Mitch gets his “15 minutes of fame” when he rescues Jay Leno from choking.

programme.title: Life Guardian
programme.desc: Caroline, Neely and Manny rescue three orphan teenage boys from drowning.

programme.title: Matters of the Heart
programme.desc: Manny is haunted by his past when two juvenile delinquents from his hometown arrive at Baywatch.

programme.title: Rendezvous
programme.desc: When a young couple’s romance is threatened by their parents, they make a pact to end their lives.

programme.title: Hot Water
programme.desc: While testing new scuba diving technology, Sam, Neely and Caroline witness a jet crash.

programme.title: Trial by Fire
programme.desc: CJ and Cody transport an injured sea lion to the animal recovery facility at Sea World.

programme.title: Baywatch at Sea World
programme.desc: Caroline finds herself being sued for negligence in civil court by the mother of a drowning victim.

programme.title: Battle B-Boy
programme.desc: A group of talented but financially struggling B-Boys join an underground fighting ring in Downtown Los Angeles that uses Hip-Hop music and Break dancing to battle for money.

programme.title: Blissfully Unmarried
programme.desc: When a down and out divorced man wins a million dollars, his conniving ex-wife will stop at nothing to get her hands on the winnings.

programme.title: Astronaut: The Last Push
programme.desc: When a tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter, Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude.

programme.title: Cream Of The Crop
programme.desc: High-school Ag Science teacher Jodi Stafford meets commercial real-estate marketing specialist Mike Jared during her struggle to save her familys ailing dairy farm.

programme.title: The View From Here
programme.desc: After a bad review of his new restaurant, a Bay Area chef must learn to cope with his struggling relationship and the death of his father.

programme.title: Something Good Coming
programme.desc: After an unforeseen store closure, two grocery store workers from different backgrounds are stuck spending time together over a weekend.

programme.title: You with Me
programme.desc: It tells the story of Kim who lives with her overprotective parents and meets Jayson online. She then ends up moving to Seoul and starts a new life.

programme.title: Sugar!
programme.desc: A housewife of a Republican candidate for U.S. Senate secretly forms an all-women rock band turning her entire world up side down.

programme.title: Not Your Romeo and Juliet
programme.desc: With a popular romance column and a soul-mate, Micki has love all figured out -until a competing, anti-romance column rivals hers.

programme.title: Dog Park
programme.desc: Nick isnt lucky in love - until a trip to the Dog Park with his ex-girlfriends dog changes everything.

programme.title: Who Will Move The Stone
programme.desc: A worldly Detroit lawyer decides to represent a Born Again Christian on trial for the murder of a Catholic Priest.

programme.title: Lucky Louie
programme.desc: A retired cop teams up with four ex-convicts and a behavioral science student to solve a fifty year old bank robbery in this new faith filled family comedy.

programme.title: 6 Nonsmokers
programme.desc: Dr. Henry Caldwell, the world’s foremost mediator, faces the biggest challenge of his career when he takes on six roommates whose only thing in common is that none of them smoke.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Bandits
programme.desc: When bratty 5-year-old Byron Reed (Chris Williams) acts out the night before a family trip, his mother (Natasha Alam) makes him sit in the time out chair. When Byron awakens to an empty house, he assumes his wish to have no family has come true.

programme.title: A Year And Change
programme.desc: After falling off the roof at a New Years Eve house party, Owen decides that its time to make some wholesale changes in his life.

programme.title: Arc: A Love Story
programme.desc: Lines are crossed and friendships tested when friends Ben and Naomi grow closer together amid a failed relationship and a broken marriage.

programme.title: The Way We Werent
programme.desc: A contemporary comedy about two people who meet just as their previous relationships have imploded in ugly fashion.

programme.title: Off the Menu
programme.desc: A just single, third generation of the big Tortilla Hut chain has to find a new dish for the chain. He meets a cute, superb chef in a New Mexican village restaurant.

programme.title: Someone I Used to Know
programme.desc: An overweight man meets a former classmate on their high school track. As the two grow close and inspire each other, their pasts creep back into their lives and begin to threaten all that they have developed.

programme.title: Bittersweet Monday
programme.desc: An emotional goodbye between longtime best friends begins an unexpected love affair, putting two marriages and many friendships at stake.

programme.title: Long-Distance Princess
programme.desc: A teen (Alicen Evans) faces a dilemma when the boy (Parker Harris) that she likes falls for her friend who lives overseas.

programme.title: Lake Effects
programme.desc: Sara and Lily grew up at Smith Mountain Lake. Sara became estranged from the family and without explanation moved to Los Angeles to study law.

programme.title: Of Dice and Men
programme.desc: The lives of six roleplaying gamer friends are thrown into upheaval when one of them enlists to go to Iraq. A geek movie without the self-loathing.

programme.title: Little Mermaid
programme.desc: A mermaid discovers harsh realities when she leaves the ocean to be with a human she barely knows.

programme.title: Aquarians
programme.desc: A wintertime drama about a seminary student who returns to his hometown and is compelled to reconnect with his estranged brother.

programme.title: Elle: A Modern Cinderella Tale
programme.desc: Elle (Ashlee Hewitt) is a girl who wants to be a singer and lives with her uncle, the owner of a small independent record label, after her parents died.

programme.title: Fighting Chance
programme.desc: An MMA fighter who has worked his entire life for a shot at the title must overcome extraordinary trials if he is ever to achieve his dreams and find his true purpose in life.

programme.title: First Responders
programme.desc: After her husband suffers a life-changing fire, trauma therapist Karen Williams discovers the limits of her expertise and must face her own fears while trying to save her marriage.

programme.title: Everything I Am
programme.desc: A young teenage girl takes a homeless man into her home, to show the love of christianity in action.

programme.title: Core
programme.desc: A woman rediscovers a relationship shes neglected when her world comes crashing down.

programme.title: The Dog Walker
programme.desc: A psychotic stalker forces a retired investigative journalist to solve a terrifying puzzle.

programme.title: The Wait
programme.desc: A mafia killer accepts to take the identity of his last victim in order to redeem his past. Two games of chess – one with his victim, the other with his boss – will stress the turning points of this change.

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: Three housemates, two dead brothers and a deliveryman are forced to live together or die trying.

programme.title: Bad People
programme.desc: A quirky and smart dark comedy, bursting with sex, violence, dirty politics and fame whores, BAD PEOPLE is a hilarious tale that reminds us that we all have a dark side!

programme.title: Texas Heart
programme.desc: A corrupt New York attorney fleeing the mob seeks refuge in a small Texas town where he stumbles upon a powerful reason to do good.

programme.title: Today’s Top Pick
programme.desc: Documentaries in this slot are rebroadcasts of our most-viewed and most popular stories of the season. They feature important social, economic, environmental or other policy-driven issues, affecting lives nationwide or simply in one small village. A broad selection of top productions by Chinese top documentary producers.

programme.title: Humanities and Geography
programme.desc: A strand devoted to the nature and wildlife of China, the people who lived alongside them, and the great and diverse landscapes with which they all contend.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An investigation involving two suspicious men in parked cars results in a foot chase and drug bust. An officer responds to a domestic call involving a threatening exhusband who is taken into custody. Officers in Florida question a deceptive and drug using couple.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A hit and run call results in the intoxicated suspect being coaxed out of his car at gun-point. Officers respond to a stabbing and the victim is rushed to the hospital by paramedics. Officers give a tour of a newly renovated jail in Maricopa County, AZ.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A car pursuit turned foot chase ends with the suspect jumping head first into a creek-bed. Officers catch up to a man trying to flee the scene after assaulting his wife. Officers stop a suspicious vehicle driving with no headlights.

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Earthquakes
programme.desc: Is it possible to protect ourselves from the catastrophic destructive power of earthquakes?

programme.title: Volcanoes
programme.desc: Enter a volcanic crater and go under the Earth to discover what makes erupting volcanoes so deadly.

programme.title: Faster Than Light: the Dream of Interstellar Flight

programme.title: Hubbles Enduring Legacy

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Parasite Planet
programme.desc: Should we save parasites? These species have a bad reputation but are an essential part of healthy ecosystems throughout the world.

programme.title: Antarctica Science Below Zero
programme.desc: Antarctica is a mysterious and unexplored continent. Thanks to the Chilean Antarctic Institute and the research center Dynamics of Marine Ecosystems of High Latitudes, a group of scientists are suffering the extreme temperatures to study climate change and the earths ocean currents.

programme.title: Amazon Burning
programme.desc: More than 60,000 fires scorched the Amazon in 2019 causing enormous damage to an ecosystem that’s vital to human existence. What caused the devastating blazes, how will they impact the climate crisis and will the Amazon ever be able to recover?

programme.title: Secret Underwater Planet
programme.desc: Take a journey with famed underwater photographer Peter Kragh, as he explores the coast of California, and reveals some of the most spectacular life found under the sea.

programme.title: Climate Crisis
programme.desc: The real impact of global warming is now being felt in communities around the world. Climate scientists explain what to expect where you live.

programme.title: Extreme Wildfire Combat
programme.desc: After record-setting conflagrations erupted in the region’s prized forests, new tools using cutting edge technology are being developed to help save property and lives.

programme.title: Greenland is Melting
programme.desc: The Greenland ice sheet, the last remnant of the Ice Age, is melting at an unprecedented rate. Today, scientists and researchers from all over the world are paying close attention to what could become a global catastrophe.

programme.title: Sea Level Rise
programme.desc: By 2100 over 1 billion people on Earth will live in low-lying coastal zones. 70% of these will live in Southeast Asia, a highly vulnerable region to climate change.

programme.title: Tsunami Coastal Lab
programme.desc: Natural hazards remain a constant challenge for over 400 million people who live in low lying communities built along major mega delta regions in coastal zones.

programme.title: Volcanic Field Lab
programme.desc: Many people now know that climate change is real, that they see the data or they see the observations for themselves. Whats needed now is a sense of urgency.

programme.title: Food Security
programme.desc: Rice, its a staple food for many in Asia. It provides 1/3 of the energy in the average Asian diet and is the income source for more than 500 million people.

programme.title: Great White Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to South Africa, one of the worlds great shark hot spots, as Andy Casagrande observes the iconic great white shark and its behavior when hunting fur seals.

programme.title: Hammerhead Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to the Bahamas as Andy Casagrande attempts to place a fin camera on the elusive hammerhead shark… what could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Tiger Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmaker Andy Casagrande travels off the coast of North Carolina to document never before seen behavior of one of the most misunderstood sharks in the world.

programme.title: Great White Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to South Africa, one of the worlds great shark hot spots, as Andy Casagrande observes the iconic great white shark and its behavior when hunting fur seals.

programme.title: Hammerhead Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to the Bahamas as Andy Casagrande attempts to place a fin camera on the elusive hammerhead shark… what could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Tiger Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmaker Andy Casagrande travels off the coast of North Carolina to document never before seen behavior of one of the most misunderstood sharks in the world.

programme.title: Mother Of The Everglades
programme.desc: Strap-in for a breathtaking tour of the history and wildlife of Lake Okeechobee, one of the largest freshwater lakes in the United States, and the source of life for South Floridas magnificent Everglades.

programme.title: Catching Floridas Apex Predator
programme.desc: Top trappers from Florida Fish and Wildlife go to battle each day against dangerous nuisance alligators that lurk beneath the lush lakes and canals of Palm Beach.

programme.title: Parasite Planet
programme.desc: Should we save parasites? These species have a bad reputation but are an essential part of healthy ecosystems throughout the world.

Thanks to the Chilean Antarctic Institute and the research center Dynamics of Marine Ecosystems of High Latitudes, a group of scientists are suffering the extreme temperatures to study climate change and the earths ocean currents.

programme.title: Extreme Wildfire Combat
programme.desc: After record-setting conflagrations erupted in the region’s prized forests, new tools using cutting edge technology are being developed to help save property and lives.

programme.title: Into the Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Real Wild West
programme.desc: Young historians, guides, and descendants tell the untold stories of the Wild West.

programme.title: Wars for the West
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Real Wild West
programme.desc: Manifest Destiny. The U.S. provokes a war with Mexico, taking California and much of the Southwest. The United States is forged in wars and now stretches coast to coast.

programme.title: Boom and Bust
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Real Wild West
programme.desc: The new West is a land of unprecedented opportunity. In less than a century, millions of prospectors rush in, boomtowns appear, and a transcontinental railroad is built.

programme.title: Mayhem and Myth
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Real Wild West
programme.desc: The Wild West is born out of the desperation following the Civil War. However, the famed Wild West looked a lot different than what we see in movies.

programme.title: Into the Wild
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Real Wild West
programme.desc: Young historians, guides, and descendants tell the untold stories of the Wild West.

programme.title: Wars for the West

programme.desc: The Wild West is born out of the desperation following the Civil War. However, the famed Wild West looked a lot different than what we see in movies.

programme.title: Mystery Signal from Space
programme.desc: Deep in the mountains of West Virginia, the Green Bank Observatory has been receiving a mysterious signal from deep space.

programme.title: Hacking our Microbiome
programme.desc: Every person is playing host to at least 40 trillion non-human microorganisms. Collectively, these microbes constitute whats called our microbiome.

programme.title: Message From Space?
programme.desc: Deep in the mountains of West Virginia, the Green Bank Observatory has been receiving a mysterious signal from deep space.

programme.title: Capturing Woodstock
programme.desc: Few films have had a bigger impact on the American psyche than “Woodstock.” Producer Dale Bell reveals what it took to create the revolutionary documentary.

programme.title: Ketamine: From Street Drug to Lifesaver
programme.desc: Worldwide, depression afflicts more than 300 million people, making it the leading global cause of disability. Suicide is the 2nd leading cause of death in the world for those aged 15-24 years. Now, there may be a new tool in fighting that depression in the 50-year-old anesthetic ketamine.

programme.title: Tiny House: Living Off the Grid
programme.desc: What do you get when you combine a passion for tiny-house living with cutting-edge green technology? Designer Graham Hill converts a small shed in Hawaii.

programme.title: New Firefighting Tech
programme.desc: Firefighters have relied on the same basic tools for decades. But former NASA engineer Mike Ralston hopes to change that with MSTAR – a new breed of an emergency vehicle that brings a powerful suite of high-tech tools from Silicon Valley to the front lines of firefighting.

programme.title: Predicting A Pro
programme.desc: Increasingly high-tech tools are being used to evaluate youth baseball players. The question is can they outperform professional scouts?

programme.title: Path to the Pros
programme.desc: What does it take to become a professional tennis player? Both on and off the court preparations help build the strength of character and focused mind to take on the challenges of a sport that demands precision and superior athleticism.

programme.title: Raising A Genius
programme.desc: Every child has a gift, and all of us as human beings have a contribution that we can make to society, and we just have to find what that is. But what does it take to create a genius? What should the education of a genius look like?

programme.title: Can You Learn to Be Funny?
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross a clown teacher, a comedian and neuroscientist? Surprising new insights about what it takes to be funny.

programme.title: The Science of Cute
programme.desc: Domestication shaped wolves into dogs and transformed both their behavior and their anatomy. New discoveries show how dogs produce a very specific eyebrow movement more often than wolves do. But how and why did “puppy dog eyes” develop in domesticated dogs?

programme.title: Bear Cub Rescue
programme.desc: Growing up in Montana, Casey Anderson came to love and appreciate wild animals at a very young age. He found a particular kinship with bears. One day he was faced with a fateful decision, leave and orphaned grizzly cub to die in the wild or save it. Now he is faced with that same decision again.

programme.title: School for Whales
programme.desc: Follow a family of sperm whales in the heart of the Indian Ocean. Alongside a team of scientists, who have witnessed their most intimate moments over the past 7 years, we will lift the veil on the largest toothed predator on earth.

programme.title: Chungungo: The Worlds Smallest Otter
programme.desc: Meet a family of Chungungos, the worlds mysterious, smallest otter. Living along the untamed coast of the southern Pacific Ocean, these furry, intelligent, and adorable creatures make their home in the wild of Chile.

programme.title: Modern Stone Age Family
programme.desc: Food Anthropologist Dr. Bill Schindler is on an international quest to discover what we should eat. He and his family uncover ancient culinary practices and show how they can bring simplicity and good health to the modern kitchen.

programme.title: Explosion of Life
programme.desc: From wildflower blooms in the desert to large colonies of jellyfish off of Monterey and unbelievable glow in the dark waves, this is California at its finest. Life can bloom in the most unexpected of ways.

programme.title: Asteroid or Alien Tech?
programme.desc: It was discovered on October 19th, 2017 and it was recognized as the first known object of its type. It is unique since it is the first known object that came from outside our solar system. But while we observed it, the mystery surrounding it grew.

programme.title: Shaquille ONeal

programme.desc: At age 19, on a missionary trip to a clinic in Brazil, Kristen Bell helped to deliver two babies. The experience ignited her nurturing nature, which endures today.

programme.title: Samuel L. Jackson and LaTanya Richardson Jackson
programme.desc: At age 20 Samuel L. Jackson served as an usher at Martin Luther King’s funeral. Jackson and his wife LaTanya have fought for civil rights around the world.

programme.title: LeVar Burton
programme.desc: LeVar Burton entered the seminary at 13 years old. But after deciding the church didn’t have the answers to his questions about life he changed his focus to theater.

programme.desc: Jimmy Donaldson, aka MrBeast, is the world’s first digital philanthropist. Jimmy built a viral video empire based on the joy he gets from helping others.

programme.desc: Joe Namath grew up in Beaver Falls, Pennsylvania. After his parent’s divorce, Joe turns to sports.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: Motor vehicle fatalities account for many of the cases that come into the morgue.

programme.title: Koston liekki
programme.desc: Rankasti ryyppaava, loppuunpalanut CIA:n agentti John Creasy (Denzel Washington) on luopunut toivosta elamansa suhteen – kunnes hanet palkataan yhdeksanvuotiaan Pita Ramosin (Dakota Fanning) henkivartijaksi. Pala palalta Creasyn sisin alkaa eheytya, mutta kun Pita kidnapataan, paasee Creasyn tukahdutettu raivo valloilleen eika han pysahdy ennen kuin teko on kostettu. Loppuun asti.

programme.title: Son of the South
programme.desc: KKK-jasenen poika varttuu etelaisissa Yhdysvalloissa 1960-luvun alussa ja lopulta han liittyy mukaan kansalaisoikeustaisteluun.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Vuonna 1961 Neuvostoliiton ensimmainen ydinsukellusvene lahtee ensimmaiselle matkalleen Pohjois-Atlantille. Mutta sukellusvene ei toimi optimaalisesti, ja koska ydinreaktorissa ilmenee ongelmia, silla on katastrofaaliset seuraukset miehistoon. Miehiston on taisteltava yhdessa ydinkatastrofin valttamiseksi, joka on seka hengenvaarallinen etta voi aloittaa uuden maailmansodan suurvaltojen valilla.

programme.title: JFK - Avoin tapaus
programme.desc: New Orleansin piirisyyttaja Jim Garrison ottaa tehtavakseen tutkia presidentti John F. Kennedyn murhaa Dallasissa, Texasissa vuonna 1963. Se, mita han saa selville, saa hanet epailemaan, etta tarinassa on muutakin kuin julkisuuden versio.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: Boys on the Side
programme.desc: Vauhdikkaassa komediassa kolme naista tekee vahingossa rikoksen ja joutuu lahtemaan karkuteille. Naiset lahtevat taipaleelle koko maan halki, ja matkan aikana he kokevat jotain heille ennalta tuntematonta: yhteenkuuluvuuden tunnetta ja ystavyytta.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: Main Street
programme.desc: Pohjois-Carolinassa sijaitsevan pikkukaupungin kuviot menevat uusiksi, kun kaupunkiin muuttaa karismaattinen muukalainen. Han suunnittelee kuolevan kaupungin elvyttamista, mutta suunnitelmat eivat ole kaikkien asukkaiden mieleen. Ainakaan mikaan ei palaa enaa ennalleen...

programme.title: Kohtalokas Syrjahyppy (Unfaithful)
programme.desc: Edward ja Connie Sumner ovat keski-ikainen pariskunta, jotka elavat amerikkalaista unelmaa New Yorkin esikaupunkialueella. Naennaisesti onnellisesti naimisissa olevien Sumnerien, joilla on kahdeksanvuotias poika, koira ja taloudenhoitaja, hiljainen maailma murtuu, kun satunnainen kohtaaminen muukalaisen kanssa vetaa Connien suhteeseen, joka voisi merkita enemman kuin vain avioliiton paattymista. KOHTALOKAS SYRJÄHYPPY on eroottinen trilleri syyllisyydesta ja raivosta, joka kysyy vaikeimpia kysymyksia kaikista suhteista.

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: House of Sand and Fog
programme.desc: Kathyn elama on riekaleina. Hanen miehensa on jattanyt hanet, ja hanen isaltaan perimansa talo on otettu hanelta pois vaarista syista. Talon uuden omistajan aikeet eivat ole pahat, mutta oikeusriita on vaistamaton. Konflikti, joka vain upottaa kaikki mukana olevat entista syvemmalle suohon. Kolminkertainen Oscar-ehdokas House of Sand and Fog on psykologinen draama perhetragedioista ja amerikkalaisesta unelmasta, ja elokuvan paarooleissa nahdaan Jennifer Connelly (Kaunis mies, Unelmien sielunmessu) ja Ben Kingsley (Gandhi, Schindlerin lista).

programme.title: In Tranzit
programme.desc: Toisen maailmansodan paatyttya joukko saksalaisia sotavankeja lahetetaan leningradilaiselle vankileirille. Leirin naistyontekijat vihaavat heidan miehensa ja poikansa tappaneita saksalaisia yli kaiken ja valmistautuvat nyt kostoon.

programme.title: Hakutulokset (Birdman)
programme.desc: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance) on musta komedia paluuta tekevasta nayttelijasta (Michael Keaton), joka on jaanyt kuuluisan supersankarihahmonsa vangiksi. Kiinnityksen saaminen uskottavaksi Broadway-nayttelijaksi ei ole helppoa, ja nayttelija paatyy ryhtymaan ohjaajaksi.

programme.title: The Dark Divide - Elamaan eksynyt
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva Sukuvika -sarjasta tutun David Crossin ja Will and Grace -sarjasta tunnetun Debra Messingin tahdittama draamakomedia. Robert on perhostutkija, jonka vaimo sairastuu syopaan. Vaimo patistaa maansa myyneen miehen perhosretkelle, jonka odottamattomat kohtaamiset ja odotetut vastoinkaymiset avaavat Robertin silmat jalleen.

programme.title: Brain On Fire
programme.desc: Susannah Cahalan on hiljattain valmistunut yliopistosta ja elaa unelmaelamaa New Yorkissa. Han on lupaava toimittaja New York Postin toimituksessa ja rakastunut muusikko Stepheniin. Lisaksi esimies on antanut hanelle toimeksiannon, joka mahdollistaa uran lapilyonnin, joten kaikki on kohdallaan. Pian asiat alkavat kuitenkin luisua kasista. Susannah sairastuu sitkeaan flunssaan, unohtaa asioita ja myohastyy aikatauluistaan. Han kuulee ihmisten puhuvan selkansa takana, on varma, etta Stephen tapailee toista naista eika pysty hallitsemaan kehoaan. Ja tilanne pahenee; Susannah alkaa saada voimakkaita kohtauksia ja hanen yha psykoottisemmaksi kayva kaytoksensa vaatii jatkuvaa valvontaa.

programme.title: Jimmy P.
programme.desc: Huolestunut Amerikan alkuperaisasukas muodostaa poikkeuksellisen ystavyyden ranskalaisen psykoanalyytikon kanssa, kun he yrittavat loytaa parannuskeinon karsimykselleen.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen nayttelee tassa kriitikoiden ylistamassa tarinassa hapaistysta toimittajasta, jonka on ohjannut ja kirjoittanut Billy Ray, CAPTAIN PHILLIPSISTÄ Oscar-ehdokkuuden saanut kirjoittaja. Kun kuuluisa toimittaja Stephen Glass (Christensen) joutuuu Forbes.com toimittajan (Steve Zahn) tutkinnan alle, paljastuu etta Glass on keksinyt monet hanen tunnetuimmista tarinoista, joka johtaa hanen tuhoonsa tassa mukaansatempaavassa, tositarinassa.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: Kesahetket (Summer Hours)
programme.desc: Helène on suvun matriarkka, joka on omistanut elamansa taiteen ja antiikkiesineiden keraamiselle. Kun hanen elamansa lopulta paattyy, hanen kolme lastaan saavat suuren perinnon kauniin vanhan maalaistalon ja kaiken siihen kuuluvan muodossa, mutta lapset ovat kaikkea muuta kuin yhta mielta siita, miten perintokohteita tulisi hallita. Kesahetket on Kultainen palmu -voittaja Olivier Assayasin vakeva perhedraama, jonka rooleissa nahdaan Juliette Binoche, Charles Berling ja Jeremie Renier.

programme.title: White Oleander
programme.desc: Astrid on 15-vuotias tytto, jonka elama muuttuu peruuttamattomalla tavalla, kun poliisi saapuu pidattamaan hanen aitiaan. Ingrid-aiti paatyy telkien taakse murhattuaan poikaystavansa ja alaikainen Astrid aloittaa oman kujanjuoksunsa. Sijaiskoti toisensa jalkeen tulee tutuksi kapinalliselle teini-ikaiselle, joka yrittaa epatoivoisesti loytaa oman identiteettinsa ihmisten ja maisemien alati vaihtuessa hanen ymparillaan. Astridin tavatessa pojan nimelta Paul heraa toivo, etta myos ystavyydella ja rakkaudella voisi olla sijaa hanen elamassaan.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in America - Suuri gangsterisota
programme.desc: Tarina kahdesta New Yorkista kotoisin olevasta lapsuudenystavasta, joista tulee varakkaita ja vaikutusvaltaisia gangstereita 1920-luvun aikana. Kumpikaan ei kykene tyydyttamaan syvimpia haaveitaan tai himojaan, ja heidan tiensa erkanevat rajahtavan vakivaltaisesti tavalla, josta selviaa totuus vasta 35 vuotta myohemmin.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Camp X-Ray kertoo nuoresta naisesta, joka liittyy Yhdysvaltain armeijaan ollakseen osa jotain itseaan ja pikkukaupunkinsa juuria suurempaa. Han paatyy kuitenkin vartijaksi Guantanamo Bayhin, missa han solmii ystavyyssuhteen yhden vangin kanssa. Eettisia kysymyksia pohtiessaan naiden kahden eri lahtokohdista tulleen ihmisen ystavyys muuttaa heidan molempien elaman.

programme.title: Varg
programme.desc: Varg on elamaa suurempi tarina Ruotsin ja Norjan rajalla asuvasta Klemensista (Peter Stomare) ja taman sisarenpojasta, Nejlasta.
