programme.desc: When a college student is reported missing, police believe their investigation will be like countless others.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Fifteen years later, DNA technology leads to justice for a murdered woman and her savagely beaten 4-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 2008, college co-ed Jenna Verhaalen was found dead in her Bryan, Texas apartment. Petechial hemorrhages in her eyes indicated that she was strangled.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2000, the body of exotic dancer Rachel Siani was found beneath a New Jersey bridge. Investigators wondered if she had committed suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Paul Grubers daughter suspected something was wrong when she received birthday cards addressed from her father, but written in a strangers handwriting.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl went missing from her Colorado home and the only evidence the kidnapper left behind was three fingerprints on a window screen.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1999, Patrick McRae was found dead in his Des Moines home and the crime scene was awash with blood.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an off-duty policeman was shot dead, his fellow officers were determined to solve the crime. They needed clues to find the killer and they discovered them in tiny fibres and an asthma inhaler.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A killer made great effort to obscure the shoe impressions left when he tracked blood on the floor, but he ended up creating new incriminating evidence...

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The woman in the back of the truck was flailing her arms, screaming. They thought she was doing something dangerous for the fun of it.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A college senior was found raped and murdered near an unpaved footpath used by students to walk from one side of campus to the other.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Digital enhancement of security camera video shows that what appears to be a casual encounter is actually a forced abduction, leading to murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a little girl got sick and died, investigators were stumped. Was it an accident, an unexplained illness or murder?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On May 12, 1994, Crystal Perry was viciously murdered in her home in Bridgton, Maine. Michael Hutchinson, 32, was found guilty of murder in the 1994 slaying at Perrys home.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 1989, the dead bodies of Joan Rogers and her two teenage daughters were found floating in Tampa Bay.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On Halloween night 2004, Adriane Insogna and Leslie Mazzara were brutally murdered in their Napa home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman is found dead in her apartment. With little evidence at the scene, the case turns cold.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The victim had ingested a massive amount of cyanide. An unlikely clue - a flaw on a mailing envelope - exposed a murderer who was willing to kill innocent people.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An aspiring model turned up dead and the prime suspect was her boyfriend. When he was eventually cleared, investigators had to dig deeper to find the perpetrator.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A millionaire and his family were executed in their own home. For three years, the murders went unsolved. Finally, a box of ammunition and some fluorescent fibers revealed the ultimate betrayal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In a tragic twist of fate, just days after the woman sold her home and moved to a modest trailer, a fire took both the trailer and her life. But the autopsy proved this was no accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The medical examiner ruled a death an accident, but the detectives thought the evidence indicated otherwise.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: When Kristine Fitzhugh failed to show up for her music class, her husband found her dead at the bottom of the stairs of their Palo Alto home. Further investigation reveals evidence of murder in the kitchen.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2007, Shamaia Smith disappeared from the strip club she worked at in East Hartford, CT. Police look at various customers of the strip club, but focus on local businessman Kenneth Otto.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman appears to have lost control of her SUV and plunged down an embankment into a shallow creek. But investigators suspect foul play when they find snowy footprints leading from the crime scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: There was no clear reason for a young, healthy college student to be dead. But when the coroner discovered a tiny clue during the autopsy, investigators were able to uncover a mystery.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An assistant manager of a Florida steakhouse is stabbed to death. It appears to be a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Even though their daughter had run away before, shed always come back. Her parents were sure this time would be no different, but they were wrong.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, Dorothy Donovan was murdered in her Dover, Delaware home and police are skeptical when her son Charles Holden stated that she was murdered by a hitchhiker he had picked up.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2000, construction manager Darrell North was found dead in his work trailer in Ft. Worth, Texas. When investigators arrived, they found that he had been stabbed 46 times.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Rachael Mullenix, 19, was convicted of stabbing her mother and then packing her bloodied corpse in a box.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a college co-ed vanished without a trace, her fellow students were concerned about her safety and their own.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 2003, Tiffany Rowell and three of her friends were brutally murdered in affluent Clear Lake, Texas.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1991, Grand Junction, Colorado is on edge after a series of deadly bombings kill two people and injure one more. Police race to find the culprit before he strikes again.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: In 2007, the Florida mobile home of Effie and Michael Ratley catches fire. Michael heroically rescues his wife and infant son. A month later, his wife is found beaten to death in a bedroom of his parents home.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Security cameras in a casino tracked a young womans movements until shortly before she disappeared. She was never seen again.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a college student is reported missing, police believe their investigation will be like countless others.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A family break turns into a nightmare when the wife is found face-down in a lake; with no idea whether it was murder, an accident or suicide, police turn to a new forensic technique.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman is stabbed more than 100 times. The killer leaves DNA behind, but investigators must play a cat-and-mouse game to obtain a suspects DNA to match.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It was one of the most unusual cases in forensic history. Investigators had to find a way to solve a murder case with evidence which consisted of a squashed tomato found at the crime scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2000, the body of exotic dancer Rachel Siani was found beneath a New Jersey bridge. Investigators wondered if she had committed suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A driver said he couldnt have hit and killed a pedestrian because his Jeep had been sold months ago.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman was brutally murdered in her home and the only witnesses to the crime were the family dogs. An expert in canine behavior was convinced the killer knew both the victim and the animals.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman attends evening church services... then disappears. When her abandoned car is found, the tank is empty and a gas can she kept in her trunk for emergencies is missing.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When court clerk Peter Porco doesnt report to his work in November 2004, a courts officer is ordered to the Porcos family home in Bethlehem, NY.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2004, Mary Ann Clibbery was found brutally murdered in her Illinois business and investigators had to determine if this was a robbery gone wrong or a calculated murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An investigation into the murder of a World War II veteran slowed to a halt when the prime suspect had a solid alibi. But a lucky break led to a shady character who wore distinctive boots.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The victim has been stabbed more than thirty times, and the crime scene is awash with her blood. Near her head, police discover a distinctive button with strands of thread still attached.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Lives changed in the 20 years following an unsolved murder, and so did forensic science. In time, a high-powered microscope and DNA profiling revealed a clue no one had seen before.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: Avis Banks and her unborn child were brutally murdered. The body was discovered by her fiance, Keyon Pittman. When police learned that Pittman was having affairs with other women, he became the prime suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files - Season 14
programme.desc: A body is found stuffed into a suitcase forcing the police to search though the landfill for another missing victim.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In one of the most brazen crimes of the 20th century, the chairman of the Coors Brewing Company was kidnapped.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The winners have been announced and this final programme follows the successful chefs in the run up to the banquet, as they make the painstaking preparations, for what is one of the most important meals they will ever cook.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: This week three newcomers to the competition, Stevie McLaughlin, Jacqueline ODonnell and Neil Rankin go head to head to represent Scotland. Today they must impress the mystery veteran judge with their starter courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The Scottish chefs, double Michelin starred Stevie McLaughlin, experienced Jacqueline ODonnell and newcomer Neil Rankin fight it out for the fish course. After yesterdays upset which chef will deliver with a dish which hits the brief?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the main course for Scottish chefs Stevie McLaughlin, Jacqueline ODonnell and Neil Rankin. Which chef will receive the ultimate accolade from the veteran judge?

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining Scottish chefs fight it out for just one place in the finals, cooking all four of their dishes again for judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the dessert course and the South West chefs last chance to secure a place in tomorrows regional final. Two will make it through to cook their menus for the judges.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two South West chefs left standing cook their four courses again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort. Todays winning chef will represent the South West in the finals taking them a step closer to cooking at the banquet

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: This week three of Wales top chefs, returning contender Mary Ann Gilchrist, former military man David Kelman and fellow newcomer Andy Beaumont compete for a place in the finals.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The Welsh chefs Andy Beaumont, David Kelman and Mary Ann Gilchrist are all hoping to score highly with their very individual main courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the dessert course and the Welsh chefs last chance to impress. After David Kelmans main course result, Mary Ann Gilchrist and Andy Beaumont must do everything they can not to crack under the pressure.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining Welsh chefs fight it out for the last place in the finals. They must both cook all four courses of their D Day inspired menus again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining Northern Irish chefs cook their entire menus again for judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort who are joined by special guest judge Celia Sandys, Winston Churchills granddaughter.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Three of the North Easts finest chefs, Michelin trained Paul Welburn, Michelin starred Frances Atkins and returning champion Colin McGurran will cook their menus for the mystery veteran judge.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The North East chefs Frances Atkins, Paul Welburn and Colin McGurran attempt to impress the veteran judge with their main courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the North East chefs last chance to impress with their desserts as only two will get to cook for the judges tomorrow. Who will be sent home?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining chefs for the North East fight it out for one place in the finals, cooking all four of their courses again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Three of the North Wests best chefs, returning contender Mary Ellen McTague, Jason Athertons protg James Durrant and ambitious new chef Mark Ellis battle it out for a place at the finals.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the North West chefs, second timer Mary Ellen McTague, Jason Athertons protg James Durrant and fellow newcomer Mark Ellis go head to head for the fish course.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its main course day for the North West chefs Mary Ellen McTague, James Durrant and Mark Ellis. After yesterdays disastrous fish course theyre all desperate to impress the veteran judge. But who will perfectly redeem themselves?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the North West chefs last chance to impress with their desserts as at the end of todays cooking one chef must leave the competition. The pressure is on as any slip up may cost the chefs a place in tomorrows regional final.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining North West chefs cook their four courses again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort, who must decide which chef will win a place in the finals.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S09 : E31 London and South East Starter
programme.desc: Three of London and the South Easts superstar chefs, returning contender Adam Simmonds, Michelin-starred newcomer Tom Sellers and his former boss Adam Byatt, attempt to dazzle the mystery judge with their starter courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S09 : E32 London and South East Fish
programme.desc: Today the London and South East chefs, returning contender Adam Simmonds, Michelin starred newcomer Tom Sellers and his former boss Adam Byatt continue their battle.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.desc: The London and South East chefs Adam Simmonds, Tom Sellers and Adam Byatt go head to head cooking their main courses.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S09 : E34 London and South East Dessert
programme.desc: Today its dessert course as the London and South East chefs compete for one of two places in the judges chamber tomorrow and the competition couldnt be tighter. Whoever scores the lowest will be going home.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S09 : E35 London and South East Judging
programme.desc: Its a tightly fought battle today as the two remaining London and South East chefs cook all four of their dishes again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: This week three of the Central regions top chefs, returning champion Aktar Islam, Daniel Cliffords protg Mark Poynton and ambitious newcomer Jason Hodnett go into battle.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Returning champion Aktar Islam, Daniel Cliffords protg Mark Poynton and ambitious newcomer Jason Hodnett fight it out for fish course glory. After plating up late yesterday will Aktar manage to be on time today?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the Central region chefs Aktar Islam, Mark Poynton and Jason Hodnett go head to head cooking their main courses for the veteran judge. With Mark and Aktar fighting for the lead can Jason sneak under the radar to take them by surprise?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its dessert day and the Central chefs Aktar Islam, Mark Poyton and Jason Hodnett are all striving for one of two spots in tomorrows regional final. Will Jasons elaborate chocolate medal dessert see him triumph or sent home empty handed?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today the two remaining Central region chefs cook all four courses again for the judges Prue Leith, Oliver Peyton and Matthew Fort. At the end of the day one chef will advance to the national finals.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Today its the starter course and as the chefs arrive they discover theres added competition following the London and South East regions shock result.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the fish course and those chefs who didnt make it onto the shortlist with their starters yesterday are hoping to do better today. Who will be in with a chance of cooking their fish course at the banquet?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: Its the half-way point in finals week and those chefs who have yet to get a dish onto the shortlist are feeling the heat. With nine dishes tasted and the scores in, theres a shock result for the chefs.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: When the Dessert result is in its down to the judges to pick the perfect menu from all four courses shortlists. Which chef will triumph to cook the starter, fish, main and dessert at the D Day banquet?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The banquet is finally here. Its the culmination of months of hard work as the winning four chefs strive to deliver their dishes to an expectant audience of wartime heroes at St Pauls Cathedral, a bastion of British wartime resilience.

programme.title: Custer of the West
programme.desc: George Armstrong Custers love of the heroic traditions of the Calvary and his distaste with the coming of industrialization leads him to his destiny at the Little Big Horn.

programme.title: Santa Fe Passage
programme.desc: A disgraced Indian scout and his partner are hired to escort a wagonload of guns through Indian territory.

programme.title: Fat Brothers of Trinity
programme.desc: The bizarre adventures of the three gunmen Western grosser, next to a delicate young.

programme.title: Gunfight at Red Sands
programme.desc: An avenging outsider riddles a gang of ruthless bandits in revenge for the murder of his family.

programme.title: Savage Pampas
programme.desc: In the late 1800s, an army captain tries to tame the open plains of Argentina which are dominated by Indians and bandits. To help do this, the captain brings in a party of women to keep his soldiers happy.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: When a sudden spurt of murders occurs in Texas Big Bend country, suspicion immediately falls on a young drifter who just moved to the area.

programme.title: Man with the Golden Pistol
programme.desc: Doc McGregor, former surgeon become player, is wrongly accused of murder and pursued by Slade, a bounty hunter.

programme.title: Now They Call Him Sacramento
programme.desc: While an infamous gunslinger saves farmers from people trying to exploit them, he falls in love with a beautiful widow.

programme.title: The Cariboo Trail
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canadas British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP13-16
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Find a Place to Die
programme.desc: An outcast Confederate soldier redeems himself by defending a woman against bandits willing to kill for her goldmine claim.

programme.title: King of the Pecos
programme.desc: Profiteer Alexander Stiles wants a million acres in Pecos River country, but rancher Claybor refuses to sell Sweetwater. When Claybor and his wife are murdered by Stiles hired guns, their son John survives and flees to Austin, where a new chapter of revenge and justice begins.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 43, 44, 45
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 46, 47
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Killer Caliber .32
programme.desc: Hired gun Silver kills a masked gang’s seven members one by one, using silver bullets and his own code of justice. Between poker games and saloon girls, his mission leads to the dramatic unmasking of the gang’s ruthless leader. Silver’s style and honor make him a deadly force in this action-packed tale.

programme.title: Fistful of Lead
programme.desc: Sartana contends with various parties - including a dapper rival gunfighter, an alluring saloon owner and a Mexican bandit - who are intent on acquiring a mining directors gold.

programme.title: Black Jack
programme.desc: After a bank robbery, Jack Murphys gang turns on him when they suspect he’ll keep the loot. They torture him and kill his sister, but Jack survives. Now, he rides for revenge in this gritty Western tale of betrayal, violence, and retribution.

programme.title: The Glory Guys
programme.desc: What could be worse for two cavalry officers than to battle with native tribes? To battle each other for the same woman.

programme.title: Border Shootout
programme.desc: Young rancher Kirby Frye is appointed deputy in a small town tyrannized by ruthless Phil Sundeen, the son of one of the founders of the town.

programme.title: Git Along Little Dogies
programme.desc: When war breaks out between oilmen and cattle ranchers, Gene sides with the ranchers until he learns that oil will bring a railroad to town.

programme.title: Bullwhip
programme.desc: In order to avoid the hangmans noose, a cowboy agrees to marry a beautiful but fiery redhead.

programme.title: California Passage
programme.desc: Cowboy Movie - A series of reversals bring two desperate people together. When a saloon owner is framed by his partner for a stagecoach robbery, he fights to secure an acquittal.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP09-12
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: Dead Aim
programme.desc: A traveling gravedigger during an war adopts a orphan he finds alone in the desert. After the war with the orphan grown and business slow, the orphan begins to generate business himself by shooting people.

programme.title: The Relentless Four
programme.desc: Texas Ranger Sam Garrett sets out to clear Rex Calhoun’s name but is betrayed by four ruthless cowboys. Left for dead and later framed for murder, Garrett escapes jail only to find a bounty on his own head. Now hunted by killers and the law, he must fight to survive and uncover the truth.

programme.title: Ultimate Gunfighter
programme.desc: Two family clans have always been enemies; they spend their time hating and killing each other. The daughter of the Campos family and the son of the Mounter family fall in love, thus causing further hatred and deaths.

programme.title: The Southerner
programme.desc: The life of the poor Tucker family, that worked as cotton pluggers and decided to get their own ground, but nature is against them.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 48, 49
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: No Killing Without Dollars
programme.desc: Lawrence White returns to Owell Rock seeking revenge for his father’s murder. To protect his identity and strategy, he adopts a new name and hires another man to impersonate Lawrence White, setting a dangerous game of deception and vengeance in motion.

programme.title: Secret of Captain OHara
programme.desc: Captain O’Hara saves Mary from Navajo warriors and brings her safely to Fort San Antonio. But her fiance, Major Brooks, is not only O’Hara’s rival but also a ruthless enemy of the Native tribes. As tensions rise, O’Hara must fight for peace while facing personal betrayal and growing conflict.

programme.title: The Plunderers
programme.desc: Cavalry officer John Drum attempts to track down outlaw Whit Lacey, but finds he must join forces with Lacey to fight a Sioux war party.

programme.title: HKFC 49 - Felix Jimenez v. Cody Clarke
programme.desc: Professional and Amateur fighters from across North America battle it out in Hard Knocks cage. Felix Jimenez v. Cody Clarke.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Bill Mahood has studied every martial art imaginable, and hell need all that experience when he takes on Kalil Ibrahim, a karate ans kickboxing expert. Steve Steinbeiss fights Jeff Ford, an MMA champion and a personal trainer on VH1s Celebrity Fight Club.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europes leading MMA shows, since its inception in 2006 its has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athletes success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Gary Vig as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athletes success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Leo McGee as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Peter Arbeau brings strong Muay Thai influences to his MMA matches. After travelling the world over constantly seeing out new training and competition experiences, Peter is more than re//ady for his next fight at HK37. This is an intense bout against an equally skilled Matt Krayco, with fists and legs flying.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Brandt Dewsberry came to MMA in an effort to learn to cope with his anger and selfishness. At HK34, in a match against Sergej Juskevic, he has to channel all of his new found skills to come out on top.

programme.title: Vieraampi kuin fiktio
programme.desc: Verohallinnon tarkastaja huomaa yhtakkia olevansa vain hanen kuulemansa kerronnan kohteena: kertomus, joka alkaa vaikuttaa hanen koko elamaansa; hanen tyostaan; hanen rakkautensa; hanen kuolemaansa.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: Viides Valta
programme.desc: He perustivat vallanpitajia hatyyttavan nettisivun ja heista tuli maailman jahdatuimpia ihmisia. WikiLeaksin perustajat Julian Assange ja Daniel Domscheit-Berg saivat haltuunsa kaikkien aikojen suurimman maaran luottamuksellisia ja vuodettuja tietoja Yhdysvaltain puolustusministeriosta. Silloin kaynnistyi sisainen taistelu. Paljonko kannattaa maksaa vapaan maailman suurimmista salaisuuksista? Mita niiden paljastaminen maksaa?Daniel Domscheit-Bergin oma kirja WikiLeaksista on pohjana aidolle trillerille, joka kertoo aikamme keskustelluimmasta ja ristiriitaisimmasta organisaatiosta WikiLeaksista ja sen perustajasta Julian Assangesta.

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: Man About Town
programme.desc: Jack Giamoro elaa amerikkalaista unelmaa. Han on Hollywoodin halutuin kykyjenetsija. Nopeita autoja, paljon rahaa ja kaunis vaimo - you name it, Jacks got it. Mutta kun han eraana paivana kadottaa paivakirjansa - joka on taynna luottamuksellisia Hollywood-salaisuuksia - ja huomaa vaimonsa syrjahypyn, Jackin elama muuttuu loistokkaasta taysin tyhjanpaivaiseksi. Ja niin alkaa kultakalan epatoivoinen kamppailu haita vilisevassa meressa.

programme.title: Murha vailla syyllista
programme.desc: Vuonna 1924 mediamoguli William Randolph Hearst kokosi joitain maailman tunnetuimmista persoonallisuuksista jahtinsa matkalle, joka johti viela ratkaisemattomaan, hiljaiseen murhaan.

programme.title: Paluu Yorkshireen
programme.desc: Arthur Morrison (Jim Broadbent) saa tietaa, etta hanella on syopa ja vain muutama viikko aikaa elaa. Hanen vanhin poikansa Blake (Oscar-voittaja* Colin Firth) muuttaa Yorkshireen aitinsa luokse, kylaan jossa han syntyi. Kun Arthurin tila heikkenee, Blake puntaroi suhdettaan isaansa. Han muistaa yhteiset hetket, heidan laheisyytensa ja heidan erimielisyytensa. Kun isa kuolee, Blake alkaa muistella heidan valista sidetta – ristiriitoja, turhautumisia, rakkautta ja menetyksia, jotka kaikki kuuluvat monimutkaiseen suhteeseen isan ja pojan valilla.

programme.title: Shes The Man
programme.desc: Viola Hastings (Amanda Bynes) kuulee kauhukseen, etta tyttojen futisjoukkue lopetetaan. Kun portti poikien joukkueeseen ei muuten aukea, Viola paattaa esiintya veljenaan Sebastianina, jonka oleskelu Lontoossa venahtaa. Mutta pojan rooli ei olekaan ihan helppo vetaa, etenkaan kun kamppiksena on sopo Duke (Channing Tatum), joka tosin on ihastunut kauniiseen Oliviaan (Laura Ramsey), joka puolestaan ihastuu herkkaan uuteen poikaan Sebastianiin... Elokuva perustuu kevytjuustoakin loysemmin Shakespearen Loppiaisaattoon.

programme.title: Legacy of lies
programme.desc: Kovaotteinen ovimies Martin Baxter tienaa lisatuloja osallistumalla laillisuuden rajamailla pyoriviin taistelulajikisoihin. Takana on ura MI6:n agenttina, jonka han jatti Kiovassa sattuneen katastrofin takia. Mutta menneisyydellahan on taipumusta loytya edesta hanen ammatissaan. Kun Baxter saa tilaisuuden selvittaa, mita Kiovassa tuona kohtalokkaana iltana tapahtui, han tarttuu siihen.

programme.title: Barbarian
programme.desc: Detroitiin tyohaastatteluun saapuva nuori nainen vuokraa asunnon kayttoonsa. Kun han saapuu keskella yota, han huomaa, etta talon on varannut joku muukin, outo mies, joka on jo paikalla. Han paattaa kuitenkin jaada, ja saa pian huomata, etta paikassa on jotain paljon pelottavampaakin kuin vain odottamaton vieras.

programme.title: Keinottelua
programme.desc: Menestyvan liikemiehen Robert Millerin (Gere) taydelliselta vaikuttava elama ajautuu syoksykierteeseen yhden kohtalokkaan erehdyksen seurauksena. Miller loytaa itsensa tasapainoilemasta perhe-elaman, yrityskauppojen, uhkaavan kavallussyytteen ja syrjahypyn ristipaineessa. Saatuaan viela sinnikkaan poliisietsiva Michael Bryerin (Roth) peraansa, joutuu Miller epatoivoiseen kujanjuoksuun yrittaessaan korjata tekemansa virheet ennen kuplan puhkeamista.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: Matrix 4, Spartacus ja NCIS: New Orleansistakin tuttu Ellen Hollman elamansa roolissa henkihieveriin piestyna naisena, jonka kosto on armoton ja perinpohjainen. Nuori pariskunta lahtee telttailemaan Alabaman metsiin, mutta romanttinen irtiotto arjesta menee kammottavalla tavalla pieleen, kun he tormaavat vakivaltaiseen huumekartelliin. Kartellin miehet tappavat Brennerin aviomiehen Dillonin (Matt Passmore) ja jattavat Brennerin kuolemaan - tai ainakin luulivat jattavansa. Kaikkensa menettanyt Brenner lahtee kostoretkelle, jota kukaan ei osannut odottaa ja jolta yksikaan ei voi valttya. Rajahtavaa toimintaa, joka intensiteetillaan naulitsee katsojan penkkiin jo alkumetreilta!

programme.title: Conviction
programme.desc: Bettyn veli tuomitaan murhasta, jolloin alkaa 18 vuoden taistelu jarjestelmaa vastaan. Betty uskoo veljensa syyttomyyteen, joten han alkaa opiskella oikeustiedetta voidakseen puolustaa veljeaan oikeudessa!

programme.title: What Maisie Knew
programme.desc: Isan lyottaytyessa sopimattomasti yhteen Maisien lastenhoitajan kanssa ja aidin loytaessa vierelleen nuoren baarimikon Lincolnin, kasvavat eroriidan panokset entisestaan, ja viattoman Maisie-paran sukkulointi kotien valilla saa yha sydamettomampia piirteita. Maisie pitaa kuitenkin silmansa valppaasti apposen auki ja nakee tarkasti sokean itsekkyyden lavitse. Maisie tietaa, etta hanen on itse raivattava tiensa kotiin aikuisten lapsellisuuden suosta.

programme.title: Shes The Man
programme.desc: Viola Hastings (Amanda Bynes) kuulee kauhukseen, etta tyttojen futisjoukkue lopetetaan. Kun portti poikien joukkueeseen ei muuten aukea, Viola paattaa esiintya veljenaan Sebastianina, jonka oleskelu Lontoossa venahtaa. Mutta pojan rooli ei olekaan ihan helppo vetaa, etenkaan kun kamppiksena on sopo Duke (Channing Tatum), joka tosin on ihastunut kauniiseen Oliviaan (Laura Ramsey), joka puolestaan ihastuu herkkaan uuteen poikaan Sebastianiin... Elokuva perustuu kevytjuustoakin loysemmin Shakespearen Loppiaisaattoon.

programme.title: Viides Valta
programme.desc: He perustivat vallanpitajia hatyyttavan nettisivun ja heista tuli maailman jahdatuimpia ihmisia. WikiLeaksin perustajat Julian Assange ja Daniel Domscheit-Berg saivat haltuunsa kaikkien aikojen suurimman maaran luottamuksellisia ja vuodettuja tietoja Yhdysvaltain puolustusministeriosta. Silloin kaynnistyi sisainen taistelu. Paljonko kannattaa maksaa vapaan maailman suurimmista salaisuuksista? Mita niiden paljastaminen maksaa?Daniel Domscheit-Bergin oma kirja WikiLeaksista on pohjana aidolle trillerille, joka kertoo aikamme keskustelluimmasta ja ristiriitaisimmasta organisaatiosta WikiLeaksista ja sen perustajasta Julian Assangesta.

programme.title: Murha vailla syyllista
programme.desc: Vuonna 1924 mediamoguli William Randolph Hearst kokosi joitain maailman tunnetuimmista persoonallisuuksista jahtinsa matkalle, joka johti viela ratkaisemattomaan, hiljaiseen murhaan.

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Albert Markovski, Open Spaces -yhdistyksen puheenjohtaja, on kokenut hammentavan sarjan sattumia, joiden tarkoitus askarruttaa hanta. Kahden eksistentiaalisen yksityisetsivan Bernard ja Vivian Jaffen avulla Albert tarkastelee elamaansa, ihmissuhteitaan ja konfliktiaan Brad Standiin, urallaan etenevan suositun tavarataloketjun Huckabeesin toimitusjohtajaan.

programme.title: Love and Other Drugs
programme.desc: Vapaamielinen Maggie (Anne Hathaway) kohtaa Viagraa kauppaavan Jamien (Jake Gyllenhaal). Heidan kemiansa petihommissa toimii, joten he paattavat aloittaa suhteen – ilman sitoumuksia. Mutta Maggien ja Jamien ottaa valtaansa huumeista vaarallisin – rakkaus!

programme.title: Cha Cha Cha
programme.desc: Siltojen alla asusteleva alkoholisti Matti (Matti Pellonpaa) on saamassa Amerikan tadiltaan huomattavan perinnon, mutta miehen tulisi olla edustuskelpoinen tadin vierailun ajan. Matti kertoo tilanteesta autokauppiaana tyoskentelevalle ystavalleen, joka ehdottaa korvausta vastaan roolien vaihtoa.

programme.title: Death At A Funeral
programme.desc: Danielin ja Robertin isan kuolema saattaa toraisan perheen yhteen suremaan vainajaa. Kun hautajaisiin ilmestyva mies uhkaa paljastaa vainajan jarkyttavan salaisuuden ellei saa rahaa, on veljesten keksittava jotain paastakseen kiristajasta eroon. Seremoniasta sukeutuu taysi kaaos, kun he yrittavat estaa uutisen kantautumisen saattovaen korviin.

programme.title: Childs Play (2019)
programme.desc: ”SE”-elokuvan tuottajien CHILD’S PLAY on taysin uusi versio pahasta Chucky-nukesta kertovasta kauhuklassikosta. Chuckyn aanena kuullaan Mark Hamill. Kun Karen ostaa huippukehittyneen Buddi-nuken syntymapaivalahjaksi pojalleen Andylle, han kutsuu tietamattaan pahuuden kotiinsa. Andyn taytyy saada aikuiset kuuntelemaan, jotta nukke saadaan pysaytettya ennen kuin on liian myohaista.

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: Isa ja tytar nousevat nopeaan KTX-junaan, jonka pitaisi vieda heidat Soulista Busaniin. Mutta matkan varrella alkaa maailmanloppu, ja suurin osa ihmisista muuttuu lihansyoja-zombeiksi.

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey goes on a treasure hunt to Venezuela for a rare CL-215 waterbomber.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo scores the charter of a lifetime when theyre asked to transport the Stanley Cup on a tour of the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalo gets into the stunt flying business when veteran pilot Arnie flies the DC-4 for the re- enactment scene of a famous WWII bombing raid.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Sparks fly when Joe discovers Gord has taken a job with a rival airline after completing expensive training on one of the Buffalo planes.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie waterbomber pilot Scott gets his first taste of action when Buffalo responds to an emergency callout to fight fires in Alberta.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A week before Christmas, Buffalo agrees to lend a hand to an RCMP initiative to fly toys to isolated communities in the north.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Greenlands Narsarsuaq airport - known as one the worlds most dangerous approaches - looms on the horizon as Cory and Justin begin a trans-global journey to deliver two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe races a quirky antique snowmobile - with an airplane engine and no brakes. The water bomber crew struggles to get two planes out of Turkey. Cocky rampie Chris Staples tries to prove himself in the C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and James battle a DC-4 engine fire. Its Joes 69th birthday - and hes never flown a helicopter before, so Mikey plans a special gift of chopper flight lessons.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graemes fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Ice Pilots NWT celebrates a milestone with a look back at the last five years, a peek behind the camera and reflections from the Buffalo crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie pilot Jeff nearly runs off the runway. Prefkar learns to play hockey but drops the ball at Buffalo and Joe goes on a date with a real dog.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey decides to get Buffalo involved in a D-Day paratrooper jump to commemorate the 70th anniversary of D-Day.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos top guns, rookies and vets, go to California for aerial dogfights in real fighter planes. Cory and Mikey race to get ready for the D-Day jump.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot Scott faces his worst nightmare when a faltering Curtiss C-46 Commando engine and low fog force a scary landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A string of bad luck turns chief pilot Arnies 66th birthday run into the flight from hell - and threatens to spoil his naughty birthday surprise.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A furious Joe fights against a federal suspension that will prevent him from carrying passengers for the first time in 20 years.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.
