programme.title: Day Three Begins
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Madfin Shark Series S1 - "Day Three Begins"
programme.desc: Day three ends at Hurricane Hole Marina in Key West, Florida, on the Madfin Shark Series and there can bo only one Madfin Shark Champion.

programme.title: Miami
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Miami"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie is given the keys to a five million dollar Pagani Huayra L’Ultimo as she explores the sub-culture of lowriders with the seal of approval from Horacio Pagani himself. Will she be accepted into this tribe?

programme.title: Detroit
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "Detroit"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie arrives in ‘Motor City’ in the dead of winter but given access to a half million dollar new Ford GT raises her spirits. Her goal is to learn more about muscle cars, born in Detroit, and her journey takes her in different directions.

programme.title: Pinky
programme.desc: A pink, air-cooled, 1973 Porsche 911 RS is upgraded with a custom built engine, new paint, and new wheels and tires.

programme.title: Benzilla
programme.desc: A slow and outdated 1959 Mercedes Benz 180 D is modified with a bargain budget to include new wheels and an American V8 muscle motor.

programme.title: The Pro Drivers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S1 - "The Pro Drivers"
programme.desc: In this profile, we get to know the Pro Drivers competing at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa race held at the Spa-Francorchamps circuit.

programme.title: Staying out of trouble
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S2 - "Staying out of trouble"
programme.desc: In this episode, we experience the beginning of the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa together with some of the most promising teams aiming for victory.

programme.title: Episode Eight
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Eight"
programme.desc: Mike and Nik review the 2021 Ford Mustang Mach-E. Nik predicts the Genesis G80 will challenge German manufacturers. He showcases the 2021 Mini GP and Polestar 2. Mike explores the 2021 Infiniti QX50.

programme.title: FMX Nomads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FMX Nomads S1 - "FMX Nomads"
programme.desc: Join Dan Whitby, Samson Eaton and Arran Powley for a day in the life of globetrotting freestyle motocross team, Bolddog.

programme.title: Day 7
programme.desc: After a week, Kevin and Jalou find themselves in the same country again: Canada. They travel from Vancouver to Whistler for the final challenge.

programme.title: Mercedes SL
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Mercedes SL"
programme.desc: Mat Watson tracks down one of the most desirable convertibles on the planet. The Mercedes SL Pagoda.

programme.title: American Car
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Find Me A Classic S1 - "American Car"
programme.desc: Mat Watson sets off to seek out a slice of Americana. A classic car from the USA.

programme.title: Volvo P1800
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Find Me A Classic S1 - "Volvo P1800"
programme.desc: Mat Watson hunts throughout Europe for a classy Nordic coupe. The Volvo P1800.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: Something is killing deer in the Missoula Valley and it has FWP working overtime to find the culprit.

programme.title: Careless Endeavors
programme.desc: Opening weekend mayhem has wardens running from one call to the next. But not all violations are negligence.

programme.title: Big Cities
programme.desc: Osaka, Japan, struggles with increasing emergency calls from its aging population. In fast-paced Greater Mexico City, home to 20 million people, medical services face overwhelming demand.

programme.title: WOMEN POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Police Patrol S1 - "WOMEN POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In Hyderabad, India, wealth and poverty coexist side by side. Each day, 15,000 officers battle crime ranging from theft to interreligious violence. In Palestine, 8,500 police face an even tougher challenge—working across a fragmented, politically tense landscape where every patrol carries risk.

programme.title: The Record
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 The Flying Kestrel S2 - "The Record"
programme.desc: Driver Jon Webster is strapped in and ready to push the Flying Kestrel to its limits.The Kestrel team must overcome multiple problems on the day to stand any chance of topping the time sheets and can Jon keep the kestrel on track and break the record

programme.title: Spain
programme.desc: We meet with a Spanish MTB pro rider who decided to create his own company in order to build the most exclusive and unique carbon bikes.

programme.title: Bali
programme.desc: We travel to Bali - Indonesia to meet an MTB pro rider who decided to start a new life dividing his time between surfing and riding active volcanos.

programme.title: New Zealand
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 MTB Heroes S3 - "New Zealand"
programme.desc: We meet one of the most famous MTB photographers in New Zealand and follow him during the biggest MTB competition in Rotorua.

programme.title: Allysas Billboard Hit
programme.sub-title: S11 : E05 Graveyard Carz S11 - "Allysas Billboard Hit"
programme.desc: Allysa and Dougie finish building out the 440 engine for the 1968 GTX, currently in assembly. And Allysa and Mark begin one of the most difficult decal applications, a White Billboard for the 1970 Cuda’ Convertible.

programme.title: Raise the Roof
programme.sub-title: S11 : E06 Graveyard Carz S11 - "Raise the Roof"
programme.desc: Dougie does a deep dive when he completely builds out the rear end assembly for our 1969 GTX. Mark and George break out the hydraulics, to reverse the damage done to Marks newest acquisition. And a Graveyard favorite returns.

programme.title: Hellafury
programme.desc: The Graveyard is covered in an unexpected blanket of snow, prompting Mark to install its first mausoleum. Meanwhile, the ghouls turn their focus on a 1969 GTX, installing its ornamentation and chrome.

programme.title: Flying High
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "Flying High"
programme.desc: The Tanalian bush pilots transport extreme paragliders to Moose Creek, in the Talkeetna Range, for a once-in-a-lifetime airbone experience.

programme.title: On Thin Ice
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Alaskas Ultimate Bush Pilots S2 - "On Thin Ice"
programme.desc: On a rare day off, Josiah and his friends white water raft where few have gone before - on top of the massive Knik Glacier.

programme.title: White Death
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Trail S1 - "White Death"
programme.desc: Snow, what the mountain men called white death, stops Laramy in his tracks. In addition, his trusty horse Seven has suffered a leg injury. Laramy must take care of Seven, battle through hunger, and survive the snowfall.

programme.title: Big Cities
programme.desc: Osaka, Japan, struggles with increasing emergency calls from its aging population. In fast-paced Greater Mexico City, home to 20 million people, medical services face overwhelming demand.

programme.title: WOMEN POLICE PATROLS
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Police Patrol S1 - "WOMEN POLICE PATROLS"
programme.desc: In Hyderabad, India, wealth and poverty coexist side by side. Each day, 15,000 officers battle crime ranging from theft to interreligious violence. In Palestine, 8,500 police face an even tougher challenge—working across a fragmented, politically tense landscape where every patrol carries risk.

programme.title: Gran Canaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Running the World S1 - "Gran Canaria"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a run through an abandoned water park on the island of Gran Canaria.

programme.title: Jamaica
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Running the World S1 - "Jamaica"
programme.desc: Brothers Max and Benj Cave are challenged to create a unique run in an unusal setting on the Island of Jamaica.

programme.title: Best of ep. 7 to 11
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Running the World S1 - "Best of ep. 7 to 11"
programme.desc: In this episode the boys look back over their time spent in Portugal India Mexico Gran Canaria and Jamaica.

programme.title: Ruhr District
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Epic Exploring S2 - "Ruhr District"
programme.desc: Exploring in the industrial Ruhr District in Germany, Josh discovers abandoned steel and mining factories and experiences a miner’s life underneath the ground.

programme.title: Isle of Wight
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Epic Exploring S2 - "Isle of Wight"
programme.desc: Cody experiences the ‘Island life’ on the Isle of Wight, England, a heaven for urban exploring including a medieval lighthouse and a derelict holiday resort.

programme.title: Charleroi
programme.desc: Local exploring in industrial Charleroi, brings Cody to abandoned factories and an unknown spot full of colorful graffiti. An old casino awaits to be explored.

programme.title: Long Break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Close Proximity S1 - "Long Break"
programme.desc: After a week-long break, Matt Field and his crew are refreshed and ready for their next stop in Montreal, Canada.

programme.title: Under The Desert Sun
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Fight to Survive S3 - "Under The Desert Sun"
programme.desc: Ed Rosenthal set out for a short hike in Joshua Tree National Park, but in the heat of the day he became turned around and lost. His six-day ordeal of survival in blazing temperatures with no food or water is nothing short of miraculous.

programme.title: Tree Stand Nightmare
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Fight to Survive S3 - "Tree Stand Nightmare"
programme.desc: When avid bow hunter, Dr. Joe Baumgardner sets out to do routine maintenance on his tree stands, a twenty two foot fall leaves him with a severely broken leg and miles from help in the deep Mississippi woods.

programme.title: Return Home
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Dropped: Project Alaska S1 - "Return Home"
programme.desc: Caseys bull speeds downstream, out of sight. Anticipation rises as they round the bend. Chris spots it washed up near white water on a gravel flat.

programme.title: Hell has a Name
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Dropped: Project Alaska S2 - "Hell has a Name"
programme.desc: The journeys to Base Camp and to sheep camp are highlighted.

programme.title: Wind Burnt
programme.desc: Saskatchewan’s bitter cold and unforgiving wind makes for brutal days and nights for Chris and Casey. A rainstorm adds more difficulty and discomfort. Mentally drained and hungry, the brothers must try new tactics to find food and warmth.

programme.title: Brotherly Love
programme.desc: The lack of hunting opportunities have drained Chris and Casey’s patience. Arguments ensue when they disagree over staying put, or portaging to a new lake. Signs of a bear remind the brothers that they must remain focused in order to stay alive.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Car Crews with Supercar Blondie S1 - "New York"
programme.desc: Supercar Blondie hits New York City in a four million dollar rare Lamborghini Centenario. Her quest is to track down the players in the underground drift driving scene and visit the exclusive Manhattan Motor Club.

programme.title: A Dangerous Game
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Morbidelli Rising S1 - "A Dangerous Game"
programme.desc: There’s danger on the track at the years biggest race, Mugello. Franco battles to focus on his goal of ‘Rookie of the Year’ while around him his team implodes.

programme.title: Surviving the Night
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S2 - "Surviving the Night"
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn that driving at night requires specific driving skills and consequently accidents are severe at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa.

programme.title: Being There at the End
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S2 - "Being There at the End"
programme.desc: In this episode, we discover that spirit and tactics for real endurance teams become vital in order to claim victory at the 2018 Total 24 Hours of Spa.

programme.title: Through the Night
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Endurance - 24 Hours at Spa S3 - "Through the Night"
programme.desc: The 24 Hours of Spa is a notoriously difficult race. For Andy Soucek, Albert Costa and Lewis Williamson, making it through night presents a tough challenge.

programme.title: The Track T
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Geared Up S1 - "The Track T"
programme.desc: A 1972 Ford Track T Roadster is incomplete and needs Titan Restorarion;s finishing touch with its flathead V8 engine.

programme.title: The T Bird
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Geared Up S1 - "The T Bird"
programme.desc: A 1957 Ford Thunderbird gets the restoration treatment with new paint, interior, and a rebuilt V8 motor.

programme.title: The 300
programme.desc: An ultra rare 1957 Mercedes Benz 300 SL Roadster is resto-modded using a modern Mercedes Benz SLK 230 as a donor vehicle.

programme.title: Episode Nine
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Nine"
programme.desc: Nik experiences Mercedes-Benzs concept for Avatar 2. Both Nik and Mike unveil top-performing cars for value. Nik reviews the 2021 Kia Telluride and 2021 Lexus IS. Mike introduces the Ford Mach-E 1400.

programme.title: Episode Ten
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Ten"
programme.desc: Nik praises the 2021 Audi e-tron Sportback. Mike talks about the return of the coupe SUV with the Infiniti QX55. Nik tests the Lamborghini Huracan EVO and explores the 2021 hybrid Wrangler 4XE.

programme.title: Episode Eleven
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Our Auto Expert S1 - "Episode Eleven"
programme.desc: Nik explores the Mazda CX30 Turbo and Toyota 4Runner. He highlights the 2022 VW IDA and off-roads in the Hyundai Santa Cruz. Hopes are high for the Lexus LF-Z Concept Electric.

programme.title: Day 1
programme.desc: Kevin travels to Switzerland and has 24 hours to go from Zurich to the Swiss mountains, while Jalou finds an exciting way to go from Cannes to Corsica.

programme.title: Day 2
programme.desc: Jalou has 24 hours to get from Barcelona to Tarragona where she conquers the Catalonian mountains with her mountain bike. Kevin tries to beat her in Slovenia.

programme.title: Day 3
programme.desc: Kevin leaves civilization behind in Suriname, while thousands of kilometers away, Jalou has to go literally through the trees in an Australian forest.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Anthony strives to prove himself as medical lead responding to a snowmobile crash on Togwotee Pass.

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: The first priority of every mission is team safety, so when conditions on Pyramid Peak threaten Jake and Cody during a rescue, Tim demands they pump the breaks.

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: Jake and Marilynn cancel a dinner party so they can respond to an injured skier on Teton Pass.

programme.title: Grey Ghost
programme.desc: Wardens get a tip about grey pickup shooting a deer at night; but even joining forces they have a tough time tracking down the Grey Ghost.

programme.title: Dump Site
programme.desc: Region 4 Wardens find a deer in the dumpster, multiple deer dumped along side the road and a deer left by a trespasser. Its all in a long days work!

programme.title: Hidden Truth
programme.desc: When Wardens stop a truck the first of November with Christmas trees in the back they know something is being hidden. Most likely the truth!

programme.title: Stripped
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Stripped"
programme.desc: Meet Nigel McNally and the team from Kestrel Beer who has hopes of breaking the land speed record in a restored 1930’a Riley Kestrel 9.

programme.title: Dyno Test
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Dyno Test"
programme.desc: The record attempt is only one week away and everything seems to be on track, until the results of a dyno test put a spanner in the works.

programme.title: Meet the Press
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Flying Kestrel S1 - "Meet the Press"
programme.desc: The official press launch of The Flying Kestrel at legendary racetrack, Santa Pod. The Kestrel team is joined by Victor Riley of Riley Cars, and celebrity Rachel Riley.

programme.title: Heidelberg
programme.desc: The team investigate ghostly activity in Heidelberg, Germany, where Chris and Paul’s equipment go haywire when a spirit of a young woman appears before Ian.

programme.title: The Rhineland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Ghost Chasers S1 - "The Rhineland"
programme.desc: This time the team are in Germany’s Rhineland where presenter Kay Nambiar hears his name being called out after becoming lost in the labyrinth of tunnels.

programme.title: Gelderland
programme.desc: The team explore reports of paranormal activity in Gelderland, The Netherlands where things take a dark turn as they attempt to make contact with spirits.

programme.title: To Beep, or Not to Beep
programme.sub-title: S11 : E08 Graveyard Carz S11 - "To Beep, or Not to Beep"
programme.desc: While the ghouls finish up the ornamentation and chrome moldings for the 1969 GTX, Cousin Dougie enlists the Greenhorns help to disassemble our first 1970 Road Runner - with careful precision to hopefully find the cars broadcast sheet.

programme.title: Surviving a Bear Attack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving a Bear Attack"
programme.desc: Nick and Laura create kick-ass tests to explore the immense power and startling speed of grizzly bears. They use Hollywood stunt tools to experience an attack. Then try to recreate a “miracle” arrow shot that saved a man from being killed by a bear.

programme.title: Surviving Treestand Accidents
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Survival Science S1 - "Surviving Treestand Accidents"
programme.desc: In this exciting episode we’ll find out the reasons why tree stand accidents happen and how we can prevent them. Cool science mixed with dynamic experiments send our hosts, our stunt team and our special crash test dummies plummeting to the ground.

programme.title: The Struggle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Trail S1 - "The Struggle"
programme.desc: Laramy remains stuck at Camp Hell Hole, nursing 7s leg, and struggling to survive in the freezing temperatures without food.

programme.title: On the Move
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Trail S1 - "On the Move"
programme.desc: Laramy and 7 leave camp Hell Hole and hit the trail again. They are headed for lower elevation in search of a more permanent place to call home.

programme.title: Pyrenees Mountains
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Man Eats Wild S3 - "Pyrenees Mountains"
programme.desc: Mario ventures high into the Pyrenees mountain range in search of the elusive chamois, and decides to meet up with an old friend who is one of Frances best wine makers.

programme.title: Finland
programme.desc: Finland is that one Nordic country that is never on the global cuisine radar. However, the reserved Finns have been quietly perfecting their craft of foraging culture and incorporating it into their unique cuisine. Jonathan Legg explores the entire expanse of the country to understand it’s cuisine, and the ethos of the country’s top chefs; from amazing locally sourced cuisine in Helsinki, to an expedition in Lapland to learn about foraging and the Finnish delicacy, reindeer!

programme.title: Martin Bochatay and Arthur Maneint
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Capturing Winter S1 - "Martin Bochatay and Arthur Maneint"
programme.desc: Martin and Arthur are two of the world’s best FPV drone pilots. Now the duo team up with pro skier and Olympic medalist, Kevin Rolland, for a unique project ; mount a cinema camera on a racing drone and attempt to film some never-before-seen action.

programme.title: Guido Perrini and Geraldine Fasnacht
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Capturing Winter S1 - "Guido Perrini and Geraldine Fasnacht"
programme.desc: Cinematographer Guido Perrini has created many of the most revered ski and snowboard films. We follow him and multi-talented athlete Geraldine Fasnacht on a snowboarding and base jumping adventure in some of the most stunning peaks in the Swiss Alps.

programme.title: Rotterdam, The Netherlands
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Breaking Beyond S1 - "Rotterdam, The Netherlands"
programme.desc: In the city of Rotterdam, three times world champion, Menno, hosts b-boy Junior from France. Both are considered legends. Menno takes Junior on a trip he will never forget and meet people who have all left their mark in the Dutch breaking community.

programme.title: NYC, USA
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Breaking Beyond S1 - "NYC, USA"
programme.desc: Four BC One World Final legends from our series, Ronnie, Neguin, Junior and Shigekix, are coming to NYC. These legends will meet some of the future legends taking part in this year’s world final and take them on a journey through hip hop history.

programme.title: Ibiza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Ibiza"
programme.desc: Three artists head to Ibiza to face their street art challenge; bringing the local community together through art. But the Mediterranean sun is unforgiving.

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Street Art Challenge S1 - "Hong Kong"
programme.desc: Two street artists team up in downtown Hong Kong to hear their street art challenge; create awareness for the citys fast growing food waste problem.

programme.title: Maui
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Chasing Monsters: El Nino S1 - "Maui"
programme.desc: Tyler Larronde beats the odds to execute a seamless barrel at the legendary big wave known as Mavericks.

programme.title: Chiang Mai - Eze
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Chiang Mai - Eze"
programme.desc: From Asia to Europe this episode explore the cultures and magnificent architecture in Chiang Mai and Eze in the South of France.

programme.title: Ice Hotel, Sweden - Bangkok
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Ice Hotel, Sweden - Bangkok"
programme.desc: From the hustle and bustle of Bangkok to the freezing temperatures of the Ice Hotel in Sweden, this episode is all about polar opposites, fire and ice.

programme.title: St Tropez - St Lucia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "St Tropez - St Lucia"
programme.desc: Romantic Caribbean Islands and sleeping fishing villages turned European jet set resorts, this episode travels from St Lucia to St Tropez.

programme.title: Piemonte
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Finding Little Italy S1 - "Piemonte"
programme.desc: In this episode we will visit the Langhe hills, which are covered in the vineyards that produce the country’s legendary Barolo wine; experience the beauty of Barolo artisanal life and its viticulture heritage.

programme.title: Florence V Northern Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Jet Set S1 - "Florence V Northern Ireland"
programme.desc: Richard attempts Jet Set crowning glory from the seat of the Iron Throne when he visits some of the Game of Thrones filming locations in Northern Ireland. While in the Italian city of Florence Gill visits Michael Angelo’s famous statue of David.

programme.title: St Lucia V Uga Bay Passekudah (Sri Lanka)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Jet Set S1 - "St Lucia V Uga Bay Passekudah (Sri Lanka)"
programme.desc: Dave has a difficult choice of who wins this episode as both Gill and Richard are in their own tropical paradise islands. Gill in the Caribbean island of St Lucia and Richard in Sri Lanka. Each boasting miles of soft golden sands and warm seawaters.

programme.title: Grenada V St Tropez
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Jet Set S1 - "Grenada V St Tropez"
programme.desc: St Tropez in the South of France is Richards location and one of the worlds most famous jet set destinations. Not to be beaten Gill’s off to the Caribbean island of Grenada to pamper herself in one of the islands best spas.

programme.title: Jeans
programme.desc: The definition of a wardrobe staple, denim is as diverse as the people who wear it. Kyle Ng travels to Japan to see how to make the worlds best jeans and to Los Angeles, California, United States to see the past and future of this fashion icon.

programme.title: T-Shirt
programme.desc: Kyle Ng travels the USA to explore the past and present of the T-shirt. He sees new silhouettes, walks the memory lane of 1990s rap tees, and tie dyes with a master.

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: Kyle Ng goes to Japan where he visits Asics, talks to Freehand Profit about his process for making sneaker masks, and explores the history of the world’s most-loved punk rock skater shoe with Steve Caballero.

programme.title: Japan
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Great Way S1 - "Japan"
programme.desc: Raúl and Alba are a Spanish young couple which love for trekking and hiking motivated them to travel around the world to walk along four of the most known trails.

programme.title: Spain
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Great Way S1 - "Spain"
programme.desc: Raúl and Alba are a Spanish young couple which love for trekking and hiking motivated them to travel around the world to walk along four of the most known trails.

programme.title: Cappadocia, İstanbul and Anatolia in Turkiye
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Travels with Darley S1 - "Cappadocia, İstanbul and Anatolia in Turkiye"
programme.desc: Discover İstanbul, Cappadocia and Anatolia in Turkiye with host Darley Newman and local experts. Visit underground cities and go hot air ballooning amid Cappadocia’s magical

programme.title: Santa Fe Railroads and Glamping
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Travels with Darley S1 - "Santa Fe Railroads and Glamping"
programme.desc: Darley explores history and nature in and around Santa Fe, New Mexico. She rides the new Sky Railway and talks to its creator, George R.R. Martin of Game of Thrones. Join her to discover diverse glamping and New Mexican cuisine and wellness.

programme.title: Santa Fe Art and History
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Travels with Darley S1 - "Santa Fe Art and History"
programme.desc: Darley shares history, food, and art in New Mexico. Learn about Georgia O’Keeffe’s life at Ghost Ranch from a cowboy who grew up with her. Explore art along Canyon Road and at Origami in the Garden along the Turquoise Trail National Scenic Byway.

programme.title: Mt Athos and Samothrace
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Mt Athos and Samothrace"
programme.desc: Mount Athos is the Holiest place in Greece, where 20 monasteries sit on a 300 square kilometer peninsula. From there, Peter will be making his way to Samothrace, or Samothraki as the Greeks know it.

programme.title: Samothrace and Limnos
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Samothrace and Limnos"
programme.desc: Samothrace is an island frequented by adventure and nature lovers alike. It’s also where they unearthed the famous winged goddess statue of Nike. Today, it’s known for its thermal springs, running waters and adventure sports.

programme.title: Limnos and Agios Efstratos
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 My Greek Odyssey S2 - "Limnos and Agios Efstratos"
programme.desc: The topography in Limnos is unlike the majority of Greek islands. Between the mountains there are fertile planes, where crops like wheat, barley and sesame are grown.

programme.title: Croatia - Istria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Istria"
programme.desc: Every grape, tree, shell, and animal brings rich rewards, but the hands that prepare them are even more prized. Ashley is eager to learn the trades, walk where Romans walked, ride to fairytale lands and become accepted into local families.

programme.title: Croatia - Split
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Split"
programme.desc: Life moves at a different pace along this cultural center of Dalmatia. The most prized islands are off the coast of Split and Ashley finds the oldest and last grappa distillery on the island of Hvar using an ancient recipe.

programme.title: Croatia - Kvarner
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Wonders Of... S1 - "Croatia - Kvarner"
programme.desc: Overcoming a turbulent past, this is where tourism and the Croatian language were written. Full of islands, coastal areas and mountaintops, this rich landscape was settled by the wealthy.

programme.title: Ulagala, Sri Lanka - Florence
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Ulagala, Sri Lanka - Florence"
programme.desc: From Michael Angelo’s David in Florence to elephant safaris in Sri Lanka, this is an art lovers and outdoorsy adventure.

programme.title: Algarve and Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos Islands)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Algarve and Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos Islands)"
programme.desc: From miles of soft golden sand in Portugal’s Algarve region, to the miles of sand that surrounds Parrot Cay Island in the Turks and Caicos, this is a beach lover’s episode.

programme.title: Barcelona and London
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Luxury Travel Show S1 - "Barcelona and London"
programme.desc: If you’re a budding architect or simply an admirer of beautiful buildings this episode takes in some of best in Europe from London and Barcelona.

programme.title: Algarve V Istanbul
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Jet Set S1 - "Algarve V Istanbul"
programme.desc: Portugal’s Algarve has long been a favorite holiday destination in Europe. Gill takes a boat ride along the regions famous sea cave coastline. While Richard enjoys a tour around the Turkish city of Istanbul, and visits the jewel in the cities crown.

programme.title: Toledo Spain V Provo (Turks and Caicos)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Jet Set S1 - "Toledo Spain V Provo (Turks and Caicos)"
programme.desc: Gill throws everything she’s got into this episode in her Spanish safari from the countryside town of Toledo, seventy kilometers south of Madrid. Richard visits the tiny island of Providenciales, part of the Turks and Caicos Islands in the Caribbean.

programme.title: Lisbon V Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Jet Set S1 - "Lisbon V Parrot Cay (Turks and Caicos)"
programme.desc: In the penultimate episode Richard remains in the Turks and Caicos Islands, only this time he’s visiting the exclusive island resort of Parrot Cay. While Gill’s combining a city and beach break in the Portuguese capital of Lisbon.

programme.title: New York
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 A Simple Path S3 - "New York"
programme.desc: Yann Horowitz delves into NYCs skate scene, visiting shops, meeting legends, and exploring iconic spots. He highlights skateboardings community and inclusivity, expressing affection for the city and the connections forged through his passion.

programme.title: Brooklyn
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 A Simple Path S3 - "Brooklyn"
programme.desc: Yann Horowitz skateboards with the KCDC skateboarding community in Brooklyn. Where he explores gaming, art and grilling with Crossy, Natalie, Jacob, Eddie and Nate, culminating in a joyful skate event showcasing community, inclusivity and fun.

programme.title: Kalahari
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "Kalahari"
programme.desc: The trip begins in the baking heat of the northwest. Andreas visits Alexanderbay, once a bustling with diamond miners, now a ghost town, and finds out about diamond hunting from a man whose life’s work has been looking for the precious gems.

programme.title: Around the Cape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Africa From Cape to Kruger S1 - "Around the Cape"
programme.desc: Different currents meet in the seas around the cape, which lead to huge seas. The waters around Cape Agulhas have a reputation of being amongst the most dangerous in the world because of the swell – and its inhabitants.

programme.title: London
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx steps outside of her comfort zone to draw inspiration for her music track from urban youths in London’s Grime scene.

programme.title: Amsterdam
programme.desc: DJ and house music producer Carly Foxx travels to Amsterdam to influence her music track and discovers it’s a whole lot more experimental than she imagined.

programme.title: Delhi
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Running the World S1 - "Delhi"
programme.desc: Parkour athletes Max and Benj Cave head to Delhi India to complete a treacherous final run challenge.

programme.title: Houston
programme.desc: Jamie Hancock was raised in Houston’s South Park area, a place notorious for gang violence, but also where hip hop artists created a new sound. Today, a new positive message is being created by people like Jamie through music.

programme.title: Los Angeles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Streets S1 - "Los Angeles"
programme.desc: Los Angeles based electronic music producer and DJ Moe Espinosa, aka Drumcell, has created sonic soundscapes which tell cinematic stories with his music. Moe has always tried to avoid commercialism and by having a vision that remains independent.

programme.title: Ivory Safari Lodge and Khulu Lodge
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Ivory Safari Lodge and Khulu Lodge"
programme.desc: Dardley joins Kristina at Ivory Lodge on the edge of Hwange National Park where her predator sightings just keep getting better. They get unbelievably close to wild cheetah and witness a cheetah hunt. Do the cheetah succeed in what they were after?

programme.title: Kavinga Safari Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "Kavinga Safari Camp"
programme.desc: Kristina’s guide, Andy, treats her to wonderful riverbed drives and wild encounters on foot. An eventful night drive leads them into a potential battle as a coalition of 3 foreign male lions step into the resident king’s territory!

programme.title: The Hide Safari Camp
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Epic Safari Destinations S1 - "The Hide Safari Camp"
programme.desc: Kristina is back with Sean and hosted at the Hide Safari Camp in Hwange National Park at their driest period. At night, they discover an unexpected leopard kill and spend time with a hungry pride as they study the menu.

programme.title: Winelands of the Cape
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "Winelands of the Cape"
programme.desc: While Xander and his team enjoy good food and wine at the family owned Spier Wine Farm, Adam spends his day making cider and looking through his family’s belongings.

programme.title: From Grabouw to Botriver
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "From Grabouw to Botriver"
programme.desc: A wine farm surrounded by mountains, a day of hiking and picnics, and delectable food paired with premium wine is on the itinerary for Xander and his team as they make their way from Grabouw to Botrivier.

programme.title: The Southern Tip of Africa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Armchair Adventurer S1 - "The Southern Tip of Africa"
programme.desc: At the southernmost point in Africa, Xander meets up with an old friend to explore the unique landscape of a seaside town and enjoy the many amenities offered.

programme.title: Delhi to Manali
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Road Less Traveled S1 - "Delhi to Manali"
programme.desc: On the verge of an epic roadtrip, Jonathan visits the shrine of the motorcycle God for providence and sidetracks to combat the all-woman unit of the Delhi police.

programme.title: Ladakh, the Mountain Adventure
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Road Less Traveled S1 - "Ladakh, the Mountain Adventure"
programme.desc: Jonathan embarks on a two wheeled journey over the highest roads in the world, stopping in remote monasteries to learn the secrets of Buddhism’s warrior demons and track down a secreted manuscript rumored to explain the lost years of Jesus.

programme.title: The Land Of Kings Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Road Less Traveled S1 - "The Land Of Kings Part 1"
programme.desc: From the pink city to the blue city, our host weaves his way through citadels, dunes and temples in this legendary frontierland of kings. He braves the rat temple in search of the lucky albino rodent and hears the epic of cow hearding Gods.

programme.title: Lake Titicaca, Peru
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Lake Titicaca, Peru"
programme.desc: The brothers hitch-hike from the ancient Inca capitol of Cuzco, down the spine of the Andes Mountains to Lake Titicaca. They suffer acute mountain sickness, get high on coca leaves and meet some locals as they battle their way across the Andes.

programme.title: Luxor, Egypt
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Luxor, Egypt"
programme.desc: The brothers chosen form of transport in Egypt is a Felucca Boat…the ancient trading vessel of transport. They travel north along the Nile, from the oasis town of Aswan to the ancient city of Luxor, before finding a massive sand dune to slide down.

programme.title: Abisko, Swedish Lapland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Beyond The Beaten Path S1 - "Abisko, Swedish Lapland"
programme.desc: Lapland is a frozen, winterland of reindeer, Sami people and saunas. The brothers start in Stockholm and fly 200 kilometers straight north above the Arctic Circle. Their chosen mode of transport for this journey is a reindeer sleigh.

programme.title: Deserts and Mountain Lions. Oh My!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Deserts and Mountain Lions. Oh My!"
programme.desc: Hiking and canyoneering are a nice break from strenuous mountaineering, but its hard to relax when a lack of water and mountain lions are part of the equation. Tayler and Jason both need a break...but is the break they need actually from each other?

programme.title: Marriage Highs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Marriage Highs"
programme.desc: Tayler and Jason reconnect during a romantic stay in Lake Tahoe, but Jason struggles keeping his cool while off roading the Rubicon Trail. Are Jasons high expectations too? And will these expectations shut them down on their next climb, Mt Whitney?

programme.title: Alpenglow
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Love On The Rocks S1 - "Alpenglow"
programme.desc: Jason and Tayler attempt to summit the highest peak in the continental US, Mt Whitney. However, during their time on ascent they run into some unexpected surprises that leave this mountain attempt one they will never forget.

programme.title: Back to where it all started
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Roads End S1 - "Back to where it all started"
programme.desc: In this episode Rob and Dave are reaching the end of their incredible journey and must go back to where it all started Buenos Aires.

programme.title: Wildest Swimming
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Wildest Swimming"
programme.desc: Chris shares his wildest swimming adventures, from swimming with hump back whales, to racing with wild dolphins!

programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Travels with the Bondi Vet S2 - "Mothers Day"
programme.desc: It’s Mother’s Day. But with adventures ranging from trapeze walking to jetpack flying, it might not be quite what you’d expect.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaikki innostuvat, kun he vihdoin alkavat kaivaa esiin lupaavia vihreita lohkareita, joiden miehisto uskoo olevan miljoonien arvoisia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun ulkomaiset sijoittajat piipahtavat yllattaen tarkistamaan Wolverinen kaivosalueen toita, ja Alan yrittaa rauhoittaa tilannetta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun Wolverinen kaivoksella vihdoin loydetaan lupaavia lohkareita, miehisto huomaa, etta he ovat saattaneet menna tonttinsa rajojen ulkopuolelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitys kasvaa, kun kaivoskauden loppu lahestyy, ja Jade Cityn miehisto haluaa loytaa kallisarvoisen lohkareen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jade Cityn kaivostyolaiset yrittavat loytaa rikkauksia - tarpeeksi suuren jadelohkareen, joka tekee vaikutuksen sijoittajiin - ennen kauden paattymista.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian ja Robinin testaamattomat koneet alkavat hajota raaalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivosalueelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Miehisto yrittaa ylittaa tulvivia jokia matkalla kaivokselle koneet mukanaan, mutta Josh jaa jalkeen ongelmallisen kaivinkoneen takia.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh jaa jumiin pitkalla matkalla Wolverinen kaivokselle, kun pultit irtoavat kaivinkoneesta eika han voi kutsua apua.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kaivoskausi alkaa, ja vaikka jadea ei nay, rekkaonnettomuus tuo Jade Citylle onnea.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Guysta tulee Wolverinen johtaja, ja uuden tyontekijan palkkaaminen uhkaa suistaa hanen tehtavansa loytaa kauden ensimmainen jadelohkare.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Juuri kun Wolverinen miehisto tehostaa turvallisuusmenetelmiaan, uusi tyontekija Jay romahtaa, mika paljastaa heidan hatavalmiutensa sarot.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Josh kayttaa uutta kaivinkonetta, kun taas arvottomien kivien kasa saa Claudian harkitsemaan uutta strategiaa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Alan tuo Jade Cityyn ostajaryhman, mika saa Claudian tiimin paniikkiin ja etsimaan kauden ensimmaiset myytavat jadelohkareet.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun miehisto rampii mudassa etsiessaan miljoonan dollarin arvoista lohkaretta, Josh riskeeraa puolen miljoonan dollarin arvoisen kaluston yrittaessaan vetaa rekkaansa pois vajoamasta.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Tiimi loytaa kauden parhaan jadelohkareen, mutta on vaarassa heikentaa sen arvoa, kun he yrittavat leikata kaikki halkeamat pois.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian poika Justin osoittaa, etta han osaa loytaa jadea, kun taas Scrappy Larry, Robin ja Josh kamppailevat hinaamaan rikkinaisen autonsa Wolverinelle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Huonot tulokset pakottavat Robinin ja Justinin viimeiseen yritykseen etsia jadekivia pelastaakseen kauden, kun taas Scrappy Larry kiirehtii muuntamaan dieselilla toimivan sailion.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudian hanke majoittaa tyoryhma Jade Cityyn vaarantuu, kun saostussailio vuotaa juomaveteen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kylman saan saapuessa aikaisin ja velkojen kasaantuessa miehisto tyontaa, vetaa ja raahaa mammuttimaisen ja mahdollisesti kauden pelastavan lohkareen leirille.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kun vuoden lupaavinta lohkaretta tyostetaan Wolverinella, Josh ja R2 kolaroivat rekka-autonsa, ja Claudia tiimineen jaavat ymmalleen.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Kilpailu on kaynnissa, jotta Wolverinen leirista paastaan pois ennen kuin kaikki jaa lumen alle.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia joutuu ajamaan kiviautoa, kun hanen miehistonsa kamppailee kivista polkua ylos Wolverinen vuorenhuipulla sijaitsevaan leiriin.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Jannitteet nousevat pintaan, kun Claudia, Robin ja miehisto yrittavat saada ihmisia ja varusteita syrjaiseen leiriinsa.

programme.title: Jade Fever | FI
programme.desc: Claudia ja Robin yrittavat tehda vaikutuksen uusiin liikekumppaneihinsa, mutta ensimmaiset paivat uudella alueellaan Bullion Creekissa ovat turhauttavia.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A transient man tries to resist the officers in booking then serenades them with a song. A difficult inmate blames his behavior on various medical conditions, and a woman claims to be Jesus Christ.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman is brought in for attacking her boyfriend. A talkative inmate is moved to isolation, and an daring inmate attempts to escape his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A hysterical woman is transferred to an isolation cell. A woman shows her undying LA pride to the arresting officers. A young woman is put under observation for threatening harm to herself.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Reno, NV a woman becomes violent with officers after having over indulged in boxed wine. In Salt Lake City, UT a drunk man is brought in for urinating in front of a family restaurant and in attempt to expedite his release he requests that the officers "git er done". In Reno, NV a former marine is taken in to custody for domestic abuse.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 In the same League
programme.desc: Booze and a cellphone dispute lead one man to the “green suit.” A couple of panhandlers profess their undying love to each other. Alcohol pushes a proud father across the line. A homeless woman gives officers career advice.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers outwit a man who refuses to give his name. A repeat DUI offender is jailed yet again. An intoxicated man is taken into custody and once the alcohol wears off he reveals that he’s broken his sobriety.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate is subdued for refusing to follow commands. A woman accused of running out on a dinner bill has her jewelry sawed off in jail. After issuing criminal terrorist threats, a man is jailed.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A testy man is sent to the isolation cell to "cool off." A teary-eyed young man maintains his innocence. An inmate may have ingested contraband to avoid possession charges.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Inmates are subdued after exhibiting unruly behavior. Anger drives emotions as a man accuses officers of racial profiling. An officer uses “verbal judo” to gain the upper hand with combative inmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An aspiring martial-arts fighter tries to wriggle out of handcuffs and gets stuck. A football rivalry takes a bad turn when a Steelers fan assaults a Ravens fan.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A homeless man punches a singing transient over a racist comment. An assailant hits a sleeping man with a brick over a money dispute. A sobbing young man insists he was falsely arrested. A bar fight sends a UFC fighter to the hospital and the bartender who slugged him to jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Sunshine on a Cloudy Day
programme.desc: A woman who says she’s called “Sunshine” has less than a sunny disposition. A man ditches a halfway house for jail to get his life in order. A career criminal shows no regret for his “thug life.” Tense moments in Booking as officers and medical staff try to save a young man from a drug overdose.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man arrested during a dangerous drug deal struggles to face jail time. Tempers flare when a man makes threats against the arresting officers. Marijuana falls out of a man’s pockets during booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Portland, OR a man in custody accuses officers of being involved in the 1992 event at Ruby Ridge. In Sarasota, FL a drunk man falls off his bike and purports to have been hit by a car. In Las Vegas, LV a daring inmate attempts to make a break for it while the supervising officers attend to a disturbance.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A drug dealers mean-spirited girlfriend lands herself in isolation. The police deal with an inebriated man accused of throwing rocks, and guards attempt to defuse a situation involving battling cellmates.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A prisoner refuses to exit his cell prompting an elaborate extraction. A man begins singing in response to his arrest. During a severe alcohol withdrawal, an inmate repeatedly escapes his restraints.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man fresh out of prison tries to prove how tough he is. A drunk woman rages against everyone in her path. A couple’s wedding plans are ruined after officers find their stash of meth, and an arrest leaves an elderly gentleman singing the blues after being processed for a possession charge.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A high-priced escort is accused of skipping out on her limo tab. A ladies man directs foul language at the jail nurse, and a seasoned prostitute considers getting into the sex-toy business.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Las Vegas Motor Mouth
programme.desc: A belligerent man with a grudge is placed in a restraint chair. An intoxicated woman receives a love note from an inmate on worker status.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A night of karaoke results in a domestic-violence charge, and a drunk inmate starts a fight with his cellmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An agitated man is overly concerned about his 30K watch. cries when he has blood drawn. An inebriated woman threatens her arresting officers with bodily harm, and a woman has no recollection of her arrest.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man attacks a medical officer and officers rush to intervene. After destroying a tree and unleashing pigeons, a woman is arrested. Unease is caused by a man’s menacing glare during his booking.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: An inmate claims to be the victim of an internet scam which led to his arrest. Officers take it easy on a rowdy inmate struggling through a spiritual crisis. Years of prison time can’t sway a young gang affiliate from changing his ways. Prisoners cause plumbing problems to send a message. A mother and daughter bond over being locked up together.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 He Said He Said Fight
programme.desc: A code red call blares after a fight occurs in the jail’s dorms. Accused of trespassing, a woman removes her clothes from her holding cell. A man is brought into detox after slamming against a cop car.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Code Blue alarms sound as inmates start fighting inside the men’s jail. An irate man with a huge beard refuses to remove bands inside his facial hair. A man with deep stab wounds stumbles into jail.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A media circus surrounds OJ Simpson as he is placed in jail for violating his bail agreement. During a body search, a man is tased and pepper-sprayed. A parole violation calls for all hands-on deck.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man outfitted in just his underwear is taken into custody. A dad gets busted for DUI while on his way to pick up a pizza for his kids. Officers recover drugs from a suspect’s pocket who is puzzled as to how they got there. A woman learns the hard way “what happens in Vegas stays in Vegas”.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man is charged with possession of an illegal substance. Police arrest a woman for narcotics, and a couple is caught passing a fake prescription.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: After refusing a breathalyzer test, an irate man bangs his head against plexiglass. A man transforms into a “cell warrior” within his holding pen. Soon to be released, an inmate considers the future.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Crack Pipe on Phone Wall
programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Needles are found on one woman while a stun gun is discovered on another. A DUI test stirs up bad memories for a man driving while intoxicated, and a convicted murderer becomes violent.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman who was nabbed for jaywalking claims the police were out of line for arresting her. A woman is brought in on domestic-violence charges, and a drug peddler claims hes selling to support his addiction to poker.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A party of three girls are brought in after having been arrested for possession at a nearby music festival. Drugs are found on the person of a music festival attendee during intake. A slightly older party goer is taken into custody for possession.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a truculent man is sent to the drunk-tank to sober up. In Portland, OR a drunk woman is jailed for attacking a child. In Sarasota, FL an intoxicated man has difficulty recalling why hes been arrested. In Spokane, WA a man "borrows" a car to curb his drug habit.
