programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A man admits to urinating in public. A couple spends their date night in jail after being over served, and a DUI suspect passes out during booking.

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Toimittaja tutkii murhasarjaa, joka tunnetaan nimella Spring break massacre ja se vie sekasorron viela pidemmalle tassa slasher-elokuvien parodiassa.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Sinun, minun ja meidan (Yours, Mine and Ours)
programme.desc: Dennis Quaid ja Rene Russo tahdittavat tata ihastuttavaa uudelleenfilmatisointia vuoden 1968 samannimisesta elokuvasta. Leskeksi jaanyt rannikkovartioston amiraali ja leskeksi jaanyt kasilaukkujen suunnittelija rakastuvat ja menevat naimisiin, mika aiheuttaa suurta harmia hanen 10 ja hanen 8 lapselleen. Lasten juonitellessa vanhempiensa erottamiseksi he tajuavat, etta tarkeinta on perhe.

programme.title: Pete Smalls Is Dead
programme.desc: Hollywoodin taakseen jattanyt kasikirjoittaja joutuu palaamaan unelmien kaupunkiin ohjaajaystavansa kuoltua.

programme.title: Wagons East
programme.desc: He tulivat hakemaan kultaa, mutta he tyytyivat mielellaan hyvaan viemarijarjestelmaan.John Candy ja Richard Lewis tahdittavat epatyypillista lankkaria.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube, Anthony Anderson, Sean Patrick Thomas, Eve ja Cedric the Entertainer tahdittavat tata hervotonta komediaa Chicagon parturiliikkeesta, jossa terava huumori ei koskaan mene pois muodista! Calvin (Ice Cube) on yrittajaksi pyrkiva nuori mies suurilla suunnitelmilla... eika perheen parturiliikkeen pyorittaminen kuulu niihin. Mutta kun han myy impulsiivisesti liikkeen epailyttavalle lainanantajalle, han tajuaa pian, kuinka tarkea naapuruston parturi on hanelle... ja kuinka pitkalle han on valmis menemaan saadakseen sen takaisin!

programme.title: Off the Rails
programme.desc: Kolme viisikymppista naista haluaa toistaa nuoruutensa Interrail-seikkailut Euroopassa sen jalkeen kun heidan laheinen ystavansa kuolee ja jattaa heille junaliput seka viimeisen toivomuksen: heidan pitaa ottaa naisen tytar mukaan. Talla kertaa matkustelu ympari Eurooppaa osoittautuu vaikeaksi heille, kun kadonneet passit, junalakot ja odottamattomat romanttiset suhteet sekoittavat heidan ystavyyssuhteensa. Kysymys kuuluukin: ehtivatko he ajoissa kunnioittamaan ystavansa muistoa?

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Break Point
programme.desc: Veljekset Jimmy ja Darren ovat vieraantuneet toisistaan. Darren on rahapulassa ja Jimmy haluaa tehda paluun tennismaailman huipulle. Siispa he paattavat lyottaytya yhteen, perustaa uudelleen nuoruutensa nelinpeliparin ja pyrkia Grand Slam -turnaukseen karsintojen kautta. Kumpikaan ei ole entisessa vedossaan, mutta erikoisten ystaviensa ja rohkaisevan, vaikkakin kyynisen isansa avulla nama nahjusmaiset sankarit saattavat oppia voittamaan parhaimmatkin vastustajansa. Rooleissa muun muassa koomikot Jeremy Sisto, Adam Devine ja Oscar®-palkittu J.K. Simmons.

programme.title: Nurse Betty
programme.desc: Betty katsoo uskollisesti lempisaippuasarjaansa “Syy rakastaa". Tormattyaan kahteen ammattitappajaan katsoessaan yhta sarjan jaksoa Betty muuttuu “Nurse Bettyksi" ja lahtee etsimaan sydamensa valittua, tohtori David Ravellia. Betty hakee unelmiensa prinssia hurjalla retkella halki maan, mutta ehtiiko han loytaa miehen ennen kuin tappajat loytavat hanet?

programme.title: Unelmien Naapuri
programme.desc: Teravapiirtokuvalla ja bonusmateriaaleilla varustettu Emile Hirschin, Elisha Cuthbertin ja Timothy Olyphantin tahdittama riehakas komedia on kuumempi kuin koskaan! High Schoolista juuri valmistuva luokan priimus, Matthew Kidman haluaa saada koulun paatokseen ilman teinihorhoilyjen aiheuttamia ongelmia. Valitettavasti, ongelma muuttaa naapuriin, eika Matthew pysty vastustamaan kiusausta.

programme.title: 7 Days to Vegas
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva tarina Hollywoodin isokenkaisista, jotka lyovat vetoa mista vain. Duke on parhaat paivansa nahnyt entinen nayttelija, joka asuu yha Los Angelesissa ja jarjestaa laittomia pokeripeleja erikoisille tyypeille. Eraana paivana peliin liittyy ohjaaja Sebastian, josta tulee pian porukan paras pelaaja. Han on tyypillinen Hollywoodin mantti elokuvaohjaaja, joka tuntee rikasta ja pelihaluista vakea. Duke tekee yhteistyota Sebastianin kanssa ansaitakseen yha enemman rahaa. Sitten alkaakin vedonlyonti siita, voiko mies kavella Las Vegasiin viikossa.

programme.title: Wheres The Money
programme.desc: South Los Angelesista kotoisin oleva nuori ja terava Del saa tietaa, etta hanen vankilassa istuva isansa ja juuri telkien takaa vapautunut setansa ovat varastaneet miljoona dollaria, jotka ovat katkettyina eraan vanhan rakennuksen kellarissa. On vain yksi pieni ongelma: arvostettu yliopisto on levittaytynyt naapurustoon, ja vanha yomaja on askettain keskiluokkaistunut valkoisten opiskelijoiden veljeskuntatalo.

programme.title: The Stag
programme.desc: Moderni sulhanen suostuu vastentahtoisesti polttariviikonloppuun kaupunkilaisystaviensa kanssa. He lahtevat leireilemaan Lansi-Irlannin villiin luontoon. Porukan kauhuksi matkaan lyottaytyy morsiamen arvaamaton veli, johtajahahmo nimelta ”Kone”. Koneen rajahtava luonne ja hurjat johtamistavat vievat ryhman matkalle, jota he eivat unohda ikina.

programme.title: Wagons East
programme.desc: He tulivat hakemaan kultaa, mutta he tyytyivat mielellaan hyvaan viemarijarjestelmaan.John Candy ja Richard Lewis tahdittavat epatyypillista lankkaria.

programme.title: The King of Comedy
programme.desc: Uransa kanssa kamppaileva koomikko uhkapelaa epavarman tulevaisuutensa tehdessaan hullun suunnitelman saada lunnaiden avulla tiensa televisioon kidnappaamalla suositun keskusteluohjelman isannan.

programme.title: Peace, Love and Misunderstanding
programme.desc: Komedia menestyksekkaasta newyorkilaisesta asianajajasta (Catherine Keener), joka tuo mukanaan kaksi vilkasta teini-ikaista lastaan hippiaitinsa (Jane Fonda) luo maalle perhelomalle. Rentouttava viikonloppu muuttuu kuitenkin pian seikkailun, romantiikan, musiikin, perhesalaisuuk sien ja itsensa loytamisen kesaksi.

programme.title: Herakles New Yorkissa
programme.desc: Olympos-vuorelta karkotettu Herakles (Arnold Schwarzenegger) lahetetaan Maahan, missa han loytaa todellisen rakkauden ja aloittaa lupaavan uran kehonrakennusbisneksessa.

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: Anna on jumissa. Han on melkein 30, mutta asuu aitinsa puutarhavajassa, ei juttele juuri kenenkaan kanssa ja viettaa aikansa tekemalla lyhytelokuvia, joissa nayttelevat hanen peukalonsa. Jotakin puuttuu, ja eristyneisyys nayttaa olevan Annan tapa kasitella suurta surua. Mutta kun Anna sattumalta ystavystyy kahdeksanvuotiaan cowboyn kanssa, han alkaa pikkuhiljaa avautua. Adult Life Skills on Rachel Tunnardin ensimmainen pitka elokuva, joka kertoo yhta lailla surullisen kuin hauskankin tarinan kuolemasta ja sen kanssa elamisesta. Broadchurch-tahti Jodie Whittaker tulkitsee sulkeutuneen Annaan roolin kauniisti ja humoristisesti.

programme.title: The Birdcage - Lainahoyhenissa
programme.desc: Tassa hysteerisessa komediassa Armand ja Albert ovat rakentaneet taydellisen elaman hoitaessaan Miami-yokerhoaan. Mutta heidan pastellinsa rauha jarkkyy, kun Armandin poika ilmoittaa menevansa naimisiin ultra-konservatiivisen senaattori Keeleyn tyttaren kanssa... ja he kaikki kokoontuvat illalliselle! Pystyvatko Armand ja Albert muuttumaan Herra ja Rouva Perhearvoiksi ajoissa?

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Katastrofielokuvassa seurataan joukkoa naurettavan kuvankauniita nuoria, jotka joutuvat yhden illan aikana lahes jokaisen mahdollisen luonnonkatastrofin riepottelemaksi. Asteroidit, pyorremyrskyt ja maanjaristykset saapuvat tuhoamaan kaupunkia ja vaikeuttavat nuorten yritysta keskeyttaa valtoimenaan riehuvaa havitysta. Hyokkayksen kohteeksi joutuvat mm. Indiana Jones, Iron Man, Amy Winehouse, High School Musical ja monet muut suositut elokuvat, pop-ikonit ja julkkikset.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Ice Cube, Anthony Anderson, Sean Patrick Thomas, Eve ja Cedric the Entertainer tahdittavat tata hervotonta komediaa Chicagon parturiliikkeesta, jossa terava huumori ei koskaan mene pois muodista! Calvin (Ice Cube) on yrittajaksi pyrkiva nuori mies suurilla suunnitelmilla... eika perheen parturiliikkeen pyorittaminen kuulu niihin. Mutta kun han myy impulsiivisesti liikkeen epailyttavalle lainanantajalle, han tajuaa pian, kuinka tarkea naapuruston parturi on hanelle... ja kuinka pitkalle han on valmis menemaan saadakseen sen takaisin!

programme.title: Fast Food Nation
programme.desc: Don Anderson on Mickey’sin markkinointivastaava, joka kehitti myos firman suurimman menestyspurilaisen, Big Onen. Tutkimukset paljastavat, etta purilaisten sisalto ei vastaa tuoteselostetta, jolloin Don paattaa alkaa tutkia koko tuotantoketjua. Hanen loytonsa ovat lievasti sanoen jarkyttavia. Fast Food Nation on Oscar-ehdokkaan Richard Linklaterin (Boyhood, Rakkautta ennen aamua) ohjaama draamakomedia, jossa vaikuttavat Greg Kinnear (Little Miss Sunshine, Elama on ihanaa) ja Bruce Willis (Die Hard, Moonrise Kingdom).

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Kun lahetti toimittaa vahingossa katkettyja kokaiinitiilia sisaltavan paketin vaaraan osoitteeseen, han kaynnistaa tapahtumasarjan, jossa kokaiinia etsivat ja siita taistelevat epatoivoisesti sen lahettanyt raivostunut diileri, peloissaan olevat vastaanottajat, joille lahetys oli menossa ja paketin vahingossa vastaanottaneet henkilot, jotka aikovat varastaa sen.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Of Black
programme.desc: Tassa paattomassa spoofkomediassa, joka ottaa elokuvan "Fifty Shades of Grey" lempeaan kasittelyynsa, tapaamme mystisen miljonaarin Christian Blackin, joka, huolimatta puutteellisista kyvyistaan sangyssa, paattaa vietella ujon collegeopiskelijan Hannah Steelen ja johdattaa hanet "romantiikan" maailmaan.

programme.title: Come to Daddy
programme.desc: Kun Norval saa odottamatta kirjeen vieraantuneelta isaltaan, han matkustaa isan syrjaiselle rantatalolle. Mutta hyvin pian han huomaa omituisen tunnelman, ja kaivatusta jalleentapaamisesta muodostuu helvetillinen painajainen.

programme.title: The Female Brain
programme.desc: Mika saa naisen swaippaamaan oikeaan herra Vaaran ja vasempaan herra Oikean kohdalla? Sofia Vergara ja Whitney Cummings tahdittavat elokuvaa, joka kertoo ihan oikeasta tieteesta (usein kaduttavien) romanttisten impulssiemme takana. Suoraviivainen neurologi Julia tutkii miesten ja naisten aivojen eroja, jotka esitellaan kolmen eri suhteen vaiheessa olevan pariskunnan elaman kautta. Julian jamerat oletukset joutuvat kuitenkin koetukselle, kun tutkimuksiin osallistuu uusi nuori komistus...

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A young drifter is suspected of murder in this stirring production from writer/director Alan Le May (best known for writing The Searchers). John Drew Barrymore stars as Cooncat, a troubled young man who has to steal to survive. With no friends in West Texas, he falls in with some bad customers who involve him in some terrible crimes. The strong cast includes Chill Wills, Jack Elam, and John Archer, with cinematography by Oscar winner W. Howard Greene.

programme.title: Painted Desert
programme.desc: A mightly melodrama of red-blooded action, William Boyd stars in the Pre-Code western talkie - The Painted Desert (1931). The first sound film for Hollywood heavyweight Clark Gable, The Painted Desert finds Boyd and Gable at odds over the affections of a cowboys beautiful daughter (Helen Twelvetrees).

programme.title: Colorado Kid
programme.desc: Cowboy star Bob Steele (Valley of Hunted Men, The Trail Blazers) headlines this Poverty Row western drama. As the Colorado Kid, hes falsely arrested for murder and has to clear himself. The colorful cast includes Ernie Adams, Frank LaRue, and Horace Murphy, with direction by Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town, The Mad Monster).

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Starring Dave OBrien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Bulldog Courage
programme.desc: Tim McCoy, one of the unsung heroes of 1930s western pictures, stars in a dual role. First, hes Slim Braddock, a miner who turns to robbing stagecoaches after being swindled by a banker. When Slim is murdered, his son Tim, also played by McCoy, seeks vengeance. Directed by B-movie legend Sam Newfield for Excelsior Pictures, this film is a showcase for McCoy, who appeared in more than 90 movies and in 1960 earned a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney take time out from their duties to try and collect the bounty posted on a legendary golden wolf that roams the Colorado foothills. A couple of wolf hunters dont take kindly to a pair of amateur hunters horning in on their range and attempt to drive the G-Men away before they can capture or kill their quarry.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney travel to Wyoming to oversee a land opening and end up playing nursemaid to a pair of identical twin pranksters and a kooky Chinese cook. Meanwhile, a trio of outlaws are pursuing the twins seeking information they possess. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: When Herby (Don Washbrook) gets drafted, Kate tries to cheer him up by saying he could become an astronaut. Could hooterville actually send someone ito the space program? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Bobbie Jo and the Beatnik
programme.desc: Bobbie Jo falls head over heals for an edgy young poet from New York. He likes her, too, but hes not fond of Hooterville. Of coure, Kate has to show Bobby Jo what this pompous fool is all about. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963. Look for Dennis Hopper as the beatnik.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to uncover a cattle rustling operation.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog..The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho investigate when a railway detective is found dead.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode first aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark goes undercover working at a gambling den. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955. Also starring Dick SImmons, Claire Carleton, Mauritz Hugo, Howard Wright, and Douglas Evans.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Detective Frankie is shot during a robbery. Her life becomes in danger when her doctor is kidnapped by the murderous outlaw Clay Allison.Starring Jim Davis, Mary Castle, Jack Kelly, Paul Farber, Frank Fenton, and Fred Sherman.Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In Family Ties, Judge Bean comes to the aid of the Peralta family as unscrupulous real estate agents try to force them off their land. Theyve learned that a railroad will need the property and they intend to make an undeserved profit. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: In this episode, crooks posing as newspapermen attempt to blackmail a local rancher in order to steal his land and property. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her fathers killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Tensions rise between the settlers and the Ottawas. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye becomes embroiled in a fortune hunters search for treasure. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild.Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After the Virginia City bank is robbed by an outlaw gang, the gangs youngest member gets a job on the Ponderosa. Initially welcomed, Little Joe becomes suspicious of Ponderosas newest member.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Prairie Pals
programme.desc: ITS A MODERN GOLD RUSH GANGSTER STYLE! But Three Ridin Singin Fightin Buckaroos Stop Em Cold! The Prairie Pals are on the lookout for Wainwright, a scientist who has gone missing after discovering a way to turn vanadium ore into gold. The Prairie Pals start their search at Hank Stoners land, where the vanadium ore can be found. Directed by Sam Newfield; starring Bill Cowboy Rambler Boyd, Art Davis, and Lee Powell.

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita
programme.desc: Roy Rogers and Trigger get top billing in this one, while the senorita of the title, Dale Evans, is billed fourth. Maybe Dale needed a better agent! Then again, who pays attention to screen credits when you have such a funfilled fiesta of thrills and action? Roys most zestful musical adventure is about a worthless gold mine that turns out to have a hidden shaft filled with riches. But can Roy make the claim while hes trying to outrun a trumped up robbery charge? Its romance, rhythm, and revelry, all from Republic Pictures. Musical numbers include Bunk House Bugle Boy and Besame Mucho, plus the beautiful title song performed by Roy!

programme.title: Heart of the Golden West
programme.desc: Roy Rogers, Gabby Hayes, and Smiley Burnette team up to protect the ranchers of Cherokee City from the false charges of illegal cattle trafficking. It may seem like the odds are against Roy, but just watch as he changes the course of the law with his flaming bullets, and, of course, a few songs. For trivia buffs: Smiley Burnette joined Roy because Gene Autry, the actor for whom he usually served as a sidekick, had joined the service!

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: The Lucky Texan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western. He and George Gabby Hayes strike it rich with a gold mine, only to find their lives complicated by women and crooked officials. Things get even messier when the good guys are framed for murder! Its all action here, particularly since legendary stuntman Yakima Cannut stars as one of the films heavies. Who will win the fight over the gold and the girl? Directed by Robert N. Bradbury for Monogram Pictures. Also starring Barbara Sheldon. (The film was also known as Gold Strike River.)

programme.title: The Sundowners
programme.desc: Brother battles brother in this gritty tale of feuding ranchers in the old west. This story of the Texas panhandle stars such familiar faces as Robert Preston, Chill Wills, and Jack Elam, and was a rare film for its time in that it was filmed almost entirely in Texas with no studio interiors. If for no other reason, watch this one for Prestons performance. If you only know him from The Music Man or Victor Victoria, youre sure to be surprised here! (also, look for John Drew Barrymore as Jef Cloud. He was part of the famous Barrymore family, and father of Drew Barrymore.) Jim Strake: Frank Cordell. The Whip: Dave Kashner. Directed by George Templeton

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes epic 1943 western, but the character youll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. Its all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Springtime in the Sierras
programme.desc: Ads for this Roy Rogers classic roared HEAD FOR THE MUSICAL HILLS...ROY IS GUNNIN FOR THRILLS! And thrills are what youll get when you watch this fun, action packed B-Western from Republic Pictures. Theres some great comic relief from Andy Devine and Chester Conklin, two of Hollywoods all-time greats. This old-fashioned shoot-em-up was directed by William Witney, who would go on to direct many of televisions top western sagas, including Bonanza, Wagon Train, and The Wild, Wild West.

programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Tom Tyler stars in this vintage western from the short-lived Reliable Pictures Company, a group known for low budgets and lots of action. In this feature, Tom reforms a gang member in order to infiltrate a ring of thieves. Rex Lease, Margaret Nearing, and Al Bridge also star.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: After a U.S. deputy marshal saves Adams life from two gunmen, he explains that he is in town to bring a close friend of the Cartwrights to San Francisco to testify in a statewide racketeering trial, but the Deputy Marshals motives for the witness soon become suspicious.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort. From 1960.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: With Tom Edwards ranch going to waste since his becoming a paraplegic following an accident with Ben, Ben makes a business proposition: The Cartwrights will build a mill on Edwards land. In return, Ben requests that he earn his investment money back as well as fifteen percent. The deal is made, but suspicions of Edwards accident bring tension to Ponderosa and put their agreement at risk.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Adam tags along with a wagon train of Quakers passing through town as he is interested in the leaders daughter. Someone, however, intends to take the gold being carried in the wagon train, putting everyone in danger.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Retired U.S. Deputy Marshall Denver McKee struggles to find the suspects responsible for stolen cattle and murdered ranchers.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright gives a strip of fertile farming land to an Indian who had previously saved Bens life. Things take a deadly turn, however, when the land ends up being next to a very racist farmer.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joes date, Jennifer, is abducted and held for ransom at the circus. He and Hoss search the circus for her, facing a tough crowd of carnies in their search.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 My Daughter the Doctor
programme.desc: The family wants Billie Jo to become a doctor, but she wants to go to Hollywood to become an actress. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. And be sure to look for Adam West in a pre-Batman role as Doctor Clayton Harris. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in January, 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Billie Jo recieves an endowment, but instead of using it for medical school, she wishes to go to Hollywood.Kate meets with Judge Drucker to see if she can legally prevent the girl from goinng. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Visit from a Big Star
programme.desc: A famous movie star (John Vivyan) stays at the Shady Rest Hotel. He wants to get away from the spotlight for a while, but it appears that Uncle Joe has told the entire valley that the hotel has a special guest. .Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Ralph Levy. Episode first aired January 28, 1964

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to convince two rich women that Shady Rest is a farm. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Guy Scarpitta..Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aried in February of 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 The Very Old Antique
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) tries to sell the Cannonball to a rich man as an antique.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1964.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Spur Line to Shady Rest
programme.desc: The Shady Rest hotel is threatened when a railroad detective comes to investigate a forgotten spur line on the property. Creator Paul Henning followed up the success of The Beverly Hillbillies with this charming CBS comedy that ran for 222 episodes. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Quick Hide the Railroad
programme.desc: Kate uses her charms to keep Homer Bedloe from catching the train to Pixley. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Bedloe: Charles Lane. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The President Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: President of the railroad comes to visit the Shady Rest hotel with the intention to terminate the Cannonballs service. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonballs throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotels annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kates intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Aces and Eights
programme.desc: Hard-hitting cowboy star Tim McCoy appears as Gentleman Tim Madigan, a legendary card sharp who uses his skills at the gaming table to help a Mexican family keep their ranch. Theres plenty of action and intrigue in this modestly budgeted western from Puritan Pictures, capably dished out by prolific director Sam Newfield (The Terror of Tiny Town). For those who take their western action straight, youll be glad to know theres no singing in this one. Its just Gentleman Tim dealing a death hand in a crooked game!

programme.title: Ridin On
programme.desc: Sometimes it took nothing less than sheer brutality to bring law and order to the untamed West! In this exciting feature from the glory days of quickie westerns, Tom Tyler plays Tom Roarke, a no-nonsense man of his time who can hit hard with either hand. He finds himself in a feud with Danny ONeil (Rex Lease), who has been accused of cattle rustling and murder. Yet, Roarke suspects ONeill might be innocent, and that the entire feud has been a frame job. Now he wants to find the real killer!

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Outlaw
programme.desc: Billy the Kid, Pat Garrett, and Doc Holliday ride again in Howard Hughes epic 1943 western, but the character youll remember most is sultry country vixen Rio McDonald. Hughes nationwide search for an actress to play Rio resulted in the film debut of Jane Russell, whose natural assets were allegedly helped by a special bra designed by Hughes. When The Outlaw finally received a nationwide release in 1946, its success vindicated Hughes and made Russell a star. As for Hughes infamous bra, Russell said in her 1988 memoir, I never wore it, and he never knew.

programme.title: Buyers Guide
programme.desc: Searching for the ideal car for frequent daily commutes; analyzing if the Mahindra Scorpio-N can replace a Ford Everest; comparing Honda CR-V drivetrains.

programme.title: Sold in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Featuring a Volksiebus that epitomises the 1950s; getting acquainted with a lesser-known Lamborghini and Sabby blows away the cobwebs in a Porsche 911 thats fit for the track.

programme.title: Petrol Heads
programme.desc: In the second instalment of the coverage of the Germany versus Japan event, the spotlight falls on a modified Mk 3 Volkswagen Jetta VR6, a tuned Honda CR-X and a bagged Mercedes-Benz SL65 AMG; from Scrape Alley limbo cars.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Featuring the Porsche 550 RS Spyder and the Audi Quattro.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: High tech turbo cars from the 80s get together at the SalzburgRing.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Le Jog classic car rally in Europe.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: At the Nurburgring in Germany, with DTM legends Bernd Schneider and Ellen Lohr.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type and the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A restored 300 SL prepares to race at the Mille Miglia classic car rally.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: A spring ride around Lake Starnberg in the Ferrari 458 Italia, a test drive of BMWs 6 series convertible at Table Mountain in South Africa, and a look at the Chevrolet Orlando family van.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Audi R8 GT, a model that the car manufacturer built only 333 units of, in everyday situations. In addition, taking a look at the Mazda MX5 roadster and Mercedes-AMG GT3.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Audi A6 2.0 TDI.

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: Testing the Wiesmann MF5.

programme.title: Nurburgring 24 Hours
programme.desc: Nurburgring 24 Hours

programme.title: StreetWise
programme.desc: The Mercedes-Benz SL 65 AMG is the ultimate German muscle car in a tailor-made suit. Also, a look at the Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG, a car that was once the Formula 1 safety car, and BMWs 6 series models.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Despite their compact size, the Volkswagen Polo GTI and Citroen DS4 pack quite a punch.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Every day people in the city fight for the last parking spaces. More and more cars are being bought and they are getting bigger and wider.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: A city car and a super sports car with the same drive concept? Exactly. The Porsche GT3 and Smart both have rear-wheel drive.

programme.title: The Dubai Police Forces Special Cars Unit
programme.desc: For the first time, the Dubai Police special cars unit allows a TV crew to accompany their officers on patrol; these arent normal police cars because this is not a normal city.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: 4x4 shows viewers the real off-road lifestyle. A look at the first Rallye Defender at Europes biggest all wheel drive exhibition.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: When winter is coming, you have a lot of advantages with an all-wheel vehicle. There is traction even when the road is slippery. For the driver this means not only more safety but also more fun behind the wheel.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: Featuring the Subaru WRX STI.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Arabella Classics is one of the most exclusive classic car rallies in Europe.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Hosts Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite petrol heads from the Middle East to bring their tuned cars to the The Walk at Jumeirah Beach and have it rated in the categories speed, style and sound.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Customized luxury vehicles visit The Walk, the glamorous Jumeirah Beach boulevard; car owners get their vehicles judged by Saif Hattawi.

programme.title: Put Your Car on TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Put Your Car on TV
programme.desc: Tuned and customized vehicles are scored based on speed, style and sound; among the competitors are a Nova SS, a special Honda Acord and a car full of crystals.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Portrait of Ferruccio Lamborghini, who originally built tractors, but then moved on to found one of the most famous sports car factories in the world.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Ferdinand Anton Ernst Porsche was a pioneer of the car business and created an icon among automobiles, the Porsche 356.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: One of the most successful rally drivers of all time, Walter Roehrl.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: BMW X5M, Audi Q7, Mercedes GLS, and Porsche Cayenne turbo are the strongest and fastest SUVs of the world. Sports utility vehicles Made in Germany are the embodiment of technical perfection, superior performance and unique comfort.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Packed with power, panache and charm, a diverse range of high-end SUVs from across the world shows how luxury comes in all sizes and shapes.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: They represent the American lifestyle more than any other car: US SUVs and pickup trucks. They are extremely large, extremely powerful and extremely luxurious and they transport the feeling of unlimited possibilities and adventure.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army; its shape wont win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: A cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC. In addition, a look at the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp and the uncompromising performance of Mercedes-AMGs SL models.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: In a city that loves to show off wealth and luxury, the Dubai police are eager to represent this image via its fleet of patrol cars that includes a Chevrolet Camaro, Lamborghini Aventador, Bentley GT, Ferrari FF, and Mercedes SLS.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: Aerodynamics influence the performance, track stability and dynamics of a vehicle. Takes a look at the Porsche 911 Turbo S, the BMW M6 convertible and the Kelleners 330d in order to explore the influence of different wings and spoilers.

programme.title: Audi R8 V10 Plus
programme.desc: The second generation of the Audi R8; V10 naturally aspirated engine, up to 610 horsepower and 330 kilometers an hour; a supercar with a lot of character.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: Its time once again for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers are already out there doing test laps, take a behind-the-scenes look at what really goes on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is regared as a dress rehearsal for the 24 hour race.

programme.title: Track Masters
programme.desc: A look at the 24 hour race, the Strong Man Run and the Tourist drivers.

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s; many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.title: Classic Cars
programme.desc: The Ford Mustang Shelby GT-500 was born of the 1960s vibe and the racing experience of Carroll Shelby, who set speed records at Bonnevile salt flats.

programme.title: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Beautifully detailed inside and out, the Pierce Arrow projected the status and wealth of its owners.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The story of the Chevrolet Corvair. The Chevrolet Corvair is pretty much unheard of in Europe, despite almost 1.4 million units sold. It was innovative, economical, modern, low priced and the first car which featured a turbocharger.

programme.title: Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur
programme.desc: Flowing lines and an elegance that is unmatched; the 1959 Bentley S2 Continental Flying Spur aims to build bridges in the companys model range; from the sporty origin of the brand to the luxury of its new owner, Rolls Royce.

programme.desc: Hans Joachim Stuck, a racing legend, ended his active career as a race driver in a Lamborghini Gallardo built by Reiter Engineering at the Nurburgring in 2011.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: BMW X5M, Audi Q7, Mercedes GLS, and Porsche Cayenne turbo are the strongest and fastest SUVs of the world. Sports utility vehicles Made in Germany are the embodiment of technical perfection, superior performance and unique comfort.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: Packed with power, panache and charm, a diverse range of high-end SUVs from across the world shows how luxury comes in all sizes and shapes.

programme.title: DreamCars
programme.desc: They represent the American lifestyle more than any other car: US SUVs and pickup trucks. They are extremely large, extremely powerful and extremely luxurious and they transport the feeling of unlimited possibilities and adventure.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army; its shape wont win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The history of Jaguar.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The story of Lamborghini.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The 1960s and 1970s were the golden years of Opel. With the introduction of colorful, modern and exciting models like the Opel Ascona, Manta, Rekord, and GT, the traditional brand from Russelsheim in Germany rose to fame.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: The S-Class in the 1950s era.

programme.title: Car History
programme.desc: Insight into the significance of the BMW 3 series and its glorious generations-long journey.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: An iconic racing car and one of only 29 ever built! We accompanied the Mercedes 300 SL lightweight on its premiere drive at the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: Frank Slopianka attends the highly ambitious and committed drag racing event Race Airport; the U.S. car dealer from Berlin takes about 11 seconds to finish the quarter mile with his 700-hp Camaro.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: The Nurburgring is the most dangerous, yet most beautiful racetrack in the world, and serves as a meeting point for racing icons and rare cars.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: Ola Stenegard, head of vehicle design at BMW Motorrad, meets world-famous motorcycle customizers in Los Angeles; also, the craziest homemade supercars are presented.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The crew at BSG Racing is familiar with spectacular conversions. Dirk Hattenhauer and his boys have already refined a lot of cars and now they perform a special project, as they want to refurbish an old Opel Kadett C Coupe.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A lot of work, attention to detail and passion is packed into a tuned show car. But it might take some time until a car like this is ready to stand on its own four wheels.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The crew of BSG Racing.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The crew of BSG Racing compete at the European Tuning Showdown.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: A show where one will find eccentric guys, the craziest car constructions and the funniest competitions.

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army; its shape wont win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.desc: The Amphicar 770 was not the fastest on the street but was ready for water.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Since its introduction in 1983 the Opel Combo has been very successful with both craftspeople and families alike. We took a look at the updated version. Also: with the XC40, Volvo introduced a new mobility concept called Care by Volvo.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Station wagons on a Formula 1 racetrack: Porsche has packed a ton of power into their Panamera with the turbo-charged four liter V8 engine. Perfect Ride takes the Sport Turismo out onto the F1 track in Bahrain.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Whats hot and whats not. There are quests to be undertaken, the search for the ideal auto, for the perfect race track for the ultimate accessory gadget. What are the preferred rides of the race legends?

programme.title: Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10
programme.desc: The Toyota MegaCruiser BXD10 has its origins in the Japanese army; its shape wont win any beauty contests or achieve the best results in the wind tunnel, but this is not really the point with an SUV like this.

programme.title: Bed Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he can’t.

programme.title: Dig This
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden.

programme.title: The Lift
programme.desc: Mr. Bean goes on a lift to the top floor of a toy shop, but Teddy gets stuck in the doors and jams the lift.

programme.title: Special Delivery
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Scrapper Cleans Up
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesn’t. It’s too expensive.

programme.title: Superhero Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes a superhero in an attempt to stop a cunning thief.

programme.title: Wrestle Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to read a book but he is disturbed by the noise of Mrs. Wicket and her friend.

programme.title: Egg and Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is storked by an unwelcome visitor.

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some.

programme.title: Beans Bounty
programme.desc: Whilst digging for buried treasure, Mr Bean digs himself a hole too deep to get out of.

programme.title: Valuable Lessons
programme.desc: Two burglars hatch up an evil plan in which one of them disguises himself as a gentleman.

programme.title: In The Garden
programme.desc: Mr. Bean tries to cut the grass in the garden but finds it impossible.

programme.title: Viral Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to read his book but gets interrupted by too much noise.

programme.title: In the Pink
programme.desc: Mr Bean, badgered by a strange pink animal, warms to the creature when it shows its true colours.

programme.title: Eau De Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wicket’s new, expensive perfume on the floor.

programme.title: Hot Date
programme.desc: Romance is in the air and Beans girlfriend is determined to have a piece of it.

programme.title: Coach Trip
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irma’s Mum, at all costs.

programme.title: Bean in Love
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes smitten with a beautiful singer.

programme.title: No Parking
programme.desc: Mr Bean cant find a parking space. So he makes one of his own.

programme.title: Birthday Bother
programme.desc: It’s Irma’s birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two –one nice, one silly.

programme.title: Green Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans electricity is cut off so he decides to build a wind turbine.

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker.

programme.title: Car Wash
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it.

programme.title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket has a new hat that looks like Scrapper.

programme.title: Toothache
programme.desc: Mr Bean bites off more than he can chew when he attempts DIY dentistry.

programme.title: A Magic Day Out
programme.desc: Mr. Bean and Irma are off for a day at the seaside.

programme.title: Bean Hypnotised
programme.desc: Mr. Bean attends a hypnotism show where he unwittingly volunteers to be hypnotized.

programme.title: A Royal Makeover
programme.desc: Mr Bean redecorates his room, making it fit for a Queen.

programme.title: Rat Trap
programme.desc: Mr. Bean has to deal with an unwanted house guest but the stubborn rat refuses to leave.

programme.title: The Ball
programme.desc: Mr Bean makes it to the top of the ladder… and gets stuck.

programme.title: The Robot
programme.desc: Mr. Bean buys a robot to clean his flat, but it ends up creating destruction across London.

programme.title: Treasure!
programme.desc: A puzzling puzzle has Mr Bean truly puzzled.

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: Bean fights a loosing battle with a winged beast from Hell.

programme.title: Dinner For Two
programme.desc: When invited to dinner by Mr Bean, it’s probably best to take your own sandwiches.

programme.title: Bean Painting
programme.desc: Mr. Bean paints a picture of Teddy, but accidentally splashes some green paint on the wall.

programme.title: The Newspaper
programme.desc: Every time Bean goes to collect the newspaper from the letterbox, it disappears.

programme.title: Charity Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan.

programme.title: No Pets
programme.desc: His landlady smells a fish when Mr Bean gets a bird.

programme.title: Neighbourly Bean
programme.desc: Bean’s pursuit of a quiet life ends in a major row.

programme.title: Super-Trolley
programme.desc: Mr Bean builds a supermarket super trolley.

programme.title: Dead Cat
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to replace his landlady’s cat after an unfortunate ‘accident’.

programme.title: A New Friend
programme.desc: A small bird wants to befriend Mr. Bean, but its squawking sound annoys Mrs. Wicket.

programme.title: Running On Empty
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol.

programme.title: A Ray of Sunshine
programme.desc: Sunbathing proves a more strenuous pursuit for Mr Bean.

programme.title: Cash Machine
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to buy a cupcake, but his wallet is empty, so he has to visit a cash dispenser.

programme.title: Valentines Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean tries to be romantic, but his idea of what that means is different to Irmas.

programme.title: Keyboard Capers
programme.desc: Determined to play the piano, Mr Bean finds a tune in his heart and sausages for fingers.

programme.title: Car Wars
programme.desc: The mystery driver of the Reliant Supervan becomes obsessed with revenge.

programme.title: The Mole
programme.desc: Mr Bean loses control of a pest and makes a mountain out of a molehill.

programme.title: Bean At The Museum
programme.desc: Mr. Bean thinks he’s just dug up a valuable coin in the back-garden.

programme.title: Wanted
programme.desc: An escaped prisoner suffers hard labour under Mrs Wicket while Mr Bean puts his feet up in jail.

programme.title: The Cruise
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime.

programme.title: Bean Shopping
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is locked in a department store overnight having the time of his life.

programme.title: The Photograph
programme.desc: The airport personnel refuses to let Mr. Bean take a flight due to his passport having no photo.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Mr. Bean prepares to give the children some tricks and treats they wont forget.

programme.title: Flat Pack
programme.desc: Mr. Beans bookcase collapses, so he buys a new one in the hardware store.

programme.title: Bean Phone
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants a smartphone but does not have enough money to buy one.

programme.title: Opera Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans car has broken down and he is late meeting Irma at the opera.

programme.title: Hopping Mad!
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds that tons of toads weigh loads and loads.

programme.title: Haircut
programme.desc: Mr Bean has a bad hair day.

programme.title: Restaurant
programme.desc: Mr Bean makes a meal out of his Birthday celebration.

programme.title: Art Thief
programme.desc: Mr Bean tries his hand as an international art sleuth.

programme.title: For Sale
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale.

programme.title: Mobile Home
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind.

programme.title: Stick It
programme.desc: Bean discovers Mrs. Wicket’s nephew and Bruiser Jnr swopping football stickers.

programme.title: Young Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes a trip down Memory Lane.

programme.title: Ice Cream
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants an ice cream cone from the ice cream van.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers the great outdoors is not always so great.

programme.title: Artful Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets a real bug for painting. Then several bugs… and flies and slugs and mice.

programme.title: Pizza Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean orders a takeaway pizza, but when it arrives, he feels let down by the size of it.

programme.title: Nurse!
programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers being in hospital isnt always a bed of roses.

programme.title: Big TV
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price-tag to match.

programme.title: A Running Battle
programme.desc: Mr Bean runs rings around the town.

programme.title: Lord Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is in the library to draw the family tree of kings.

programme.title: Game Over
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wicket’s nephew.

programme.title: Goldfish
programme.desc: Mr Bean nearly gets fed to the fish!

programme.title: A Round of Golf
programme.desc: Mr. Bean fancies a game of golf.

programme.title: SuperMarrow
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets green eyes and green fingers.

programme.title: In The Wild
programme.desc: Mr. Bean decides to become a wildlife photographer.

programme.title: Bean Encore
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert.

programme.title: Scout Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes a Scoutmaster for the day.

programme.title: Bean Bug
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas, and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person.

programme.title: Birthday Bear
programme.desc: Mr Bean forgets his teddy’s Birthday - then gives him a treat to remember.

programme.title: Litterbugs
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town.

programme.title: Ball Pool
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wants to play inside the local play area, but he is not allowed to enter.

programme.title: Save That Tree
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down.

programme.title: The Visitor

In an effort to feel better, she reconnects with her half-sister Grace, (Lauren Fales) and, inspired by a new boyfriend (Brian Rieger), sets out on a quest to find someone to help. Though excited and hopeful when she meets an eccentric woman named Maria (Karen Black), she soon discovers Maria is a compulsive hoarder, and is swept up in a situation more emotionally and morally complicated than she had expected to find. Inspired by a true story.

Struggling with grief, Becky decides she needs to leave the family farm and all its memories. She leaves Acie with her grandfather Ben and visits with her friend from school, June. With all the best intent, June offers Becky plenty of distraction from her family life. Fueled by her anger at G*d and loss of faith, Becky starts drinking and making other self-destructive choices. programme.title: Forever Is A Lie
programme.desc: Jason and Ivy are a young couple and partners in love and in crime as they get money from commiting fraudulent activities against unsuspecting victims, however things start to go wrong when jealousy seeps in and one of them takes things too far. Starring Jessica Tse, Chuddy Davidson, Dante Okere

programme.title: Burning Desire
programme.desc: After getting drunk during a club party with friends, kay gets entangled in a one-night stand with an older married woman, mariah, who becomes obsessed with him. Things go awry when kay comes back home from work one evening and finds mariah sitting in his living room with his wife, angela, claiming to be his aunt who just returned from overseas.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep2
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her 6-Cardinal Rules. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep3
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her 6-Cardinal Rules. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Alero has dreams to be a bodyguard but stereotypes against women reduces her to be a supermarket security. Although it’s not her dream job, she is a very good at it which makes her male colleagues envious, causing them to set her up and kidnap her. While being held hostage she meets musician who was also being held by the kidnappers.

programme.title: Flatmates Nightmare
programme.desc: Hayley and James get off on the wrong foot from their first meeting with each other, and sparks fly as they try living together in harmony.

programme.title: Grip
programme.desc: A wealthy man, who has vowed to never fall in love, meets a woman that refuses to fall for his charms, forcing him to re-evaluate his stance on relationships.

programme.title: Humble Pie
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A down-on-their luck couple turn to a life of crime, calling themselves Bonnie and Clyde, when the man loses his job due to unfortunate circumstances. Their crimes lead the to a bickering couple, Eric and Zara, and the chance meeting has everyone re-evaluating their actions.

programme.title: Amoral
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Patricia is suspicious that her husband, Ugo, is having an affair because he seizes every opportunity to avoid sexual intimacy with her. She startes an affair after listening to her sister’s advice and begins an affair with her co-worker only for her husband to tell her the true reason for his avoidance; however, her actions have set a series of consequences in motion.

programme.title: Lost Focus
programme.desc: A man plays tit-for-tat with his estranged wife and loses focus which costs him his family, wealth and happiness. The situation gets dire and it seems like the solution lies in the hands of his ex-wife.

programme.title: Unprecedented
programme.desc: Nadia and Simon start developing feelings for each other after Nadia is hired as a nurse for his wife, Theresa. Things get further complicated when their son, Raymond, comes home to visit and Theresa ends up dead.

programme.title: The Hangout Season 4 - EP 5
programme.desc: A group of opinionated, social media-savvy millennials debate controversial topics on love, sex, friendship, and more.

programme.title: Number 1 Pastor
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Eze was not called by God, but by money when he realizes how much money pastors are making. He decides to venture into the ministry, guising as a pastor, and develops a plan to get money. He plants listening devices in the houses of his church members and pretending to prophesy what he listens in on. His ministry grows big but he soon catches the attention of Shalewa , a young investigative journalist who is desperate for her big break and she decides to do a piece on him.

programme.title: The Housekeepers Daughter
programme.desc: A housekeeper and her boss decide to play matchmaker between her daughter and his son but plans go awry as an unforeseen chain of events and perhaps a sprinkling of fate bring about totally unexpected results.

programme.title: A Dance With Mama
programme.desc: The past and present collide when young man is about to become a father for the first time and sees that some of the challenges his wife goes through appear to mirror what his mother suffered through

programme.title: AMC Movie Talk S6 - Editi Effiong
programme.desc: Join us every week on the AMC couch as we talk to the biggest movers and shakers in the buzzing industry. We are putting you in the know with all things in African and Nollywood cinema actors, actresses, directors, producers, classic cinema and soon to be blockbuster hits its all here on AMC Movie Talk.

programme.title: Roses Are Red
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. After a successful heart surgery, Samuel wakes up a completely different man. However, his sudden interest in art, classical literature goes contrary to his previous self.

programme.title: Loving A Con Man
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Zed, who goes by many names, is a perfect con man, making women fall for him and taking their money. Things start to change when he meets Tabitha, a successful novelist with a fiance abroad. Zed believes she is the perfect victim for a con until he starts to fall for her.

programme.title: Demands
programme.desc: The lives of two couples is forever entwined as they deal with lack of commitment, infidelity and unexpected pregnancies.

programme.title: Femi
programme.desc: Geneticist Femi Fernandez seeks the perfect male gene, inspired by the works of an enchanting painting, that makes her unexpectedly drawn to the artist to devastating consequences.

programme.title: Only True Love
programme.desc: Bella, 24, dark and pretty, had a very rough lifestyle in the past. She lived a worthless life back in the village and aborted not less than 18 times before the age of nineteen.

programme.title: Fashion Insider - Larry Hector
programme.desc: Discover new designers, trends, styles, and more at Fashion Insider. Elileojo Achebo provides you with the opportunity to gain firsthand knowledge of the African stylists of the moment.

programme.title: Business Men
programme.desc: In a bid to make some extra cash and impress the family of his beloved, David unknowingly gets involved with some nefarious characters leading up to a major police investigation.

programme.title: Insight
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. A rich couples plan to have their first child abroad hit a snag when the man loses his main source of income but refuses to let his wife know. He decides to do several jobs to make up the money but ends up neglecting his wife. Things take a turn when she finds out about the deceit by accident.

programme.title: Clandestine
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Alex and Lola are on the verge of a messy divorce due to Alex’s promiscuity. Still raving with desire for each other, Lola’s parents’ step in to try and save the day but would their efforts be enough now that music aficionado Lola has met the canary, George?

programme.title: Dark Horse
programme.desc: Imeldas father vehemently disapproves of her relationahip with her new boyfriend, causing a rift within their family. Is he just over-protective or is there something more sinister behind his behaviour?

programme.title: Digging Deep
programme.desc: A group of young women faces very different challenges in their relationships, from infidelity to negligence, try to help each other out with their problems but things do not go as planned

programme.title: Do Not Marry
programme.desc: Lekan tries to put peter off getting married because he wants to continue to live off peter free of charge. He hires a hooker, simi, as a way to get peter’s mind off the marriage train but his plan backfires when simi discovers lekan’s true motives.
