programme.title: WOF 2023 #40: BetCity Royal Championships Queen and King of the Court 2023
programme.desc: Dieses Turnier ist groSSer als je zuvor, die besten Spieler der Welt kommen vom 5. bis 10. September nach Manhattan an der Maas. Ein konigliches Stadion direkt im Stadtzentrum am Henegouwerplein ist der Schauplatz und Nebenplatze in den Vororten umrahmen dieses Ereignis.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #41: Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine 2023
programme.desc: Der VANORA ENGADINWIND by Dakine kehrt 2023 mit viel spannender Windsurf-Action auf dem Silvaplanasee in der Schweiz zuruck. Der ENGADINWIND ist auch Gastgeber der ersten iQ FOiL U21 Weltmeisterschaft, die fur das olympische Programm in Paris 2024 ausgewahlt wurde.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #42: WES E-Bike World Series #5 and World Rookie Tour Finals
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode machen wir einen Stadtetrip: Zuerst schauen wir bei der WES E-Bike World Series in Bielstein, Deutschland, vorbei und dann gehts weiter zum Finale der World Rookie Tour und ihren jungen Skatetalente in Innbruck.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #43: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour The Stars of Freestyle
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werden wir die GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023 besuchen. Die Halfte der Kitesurfing-Freestyle-Saison ist bereits vorbei und das ist ein guter Grund, die vergangenen Events und den aktuellen Stand der Athleten zu analysieren.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #37: Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 - Paros (GRE)
programme.desc: The Freestyle Pro Tour 2025 stops off at the beautiful island of Paros in Greece. Crystal clear water, steady meltemi winds, and the breathtaking backdrop of the Aegean Sea set the stage for the worlds best freestyle windsurfers.

programme.title: Profile Freeskier Nadine Wallner
programme.desc: Nadine Wallner is a freeskier, climber and mountaineer who has experienced incredible highs and devastating lows on her journey of discovery. She takes part in the Freeride World Tour, the pinnacle of freeriding competition for skiers and snowboarders.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #2 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The worlds best freeriders compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The second stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 24th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: Cerro Torre Fly and Climb
programme.desc: The West Face route with its long glacier approach through the Circo de los Altares certainly feels ‘out there’. That the whole team were able to take off from the summit with their paragliders is a testament to their skill, both as climbers and as pilots.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #20: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship
programme.desc: This week we follow the worlds boldest Downhill-Skaters, racing down the turkish Mountinroads of Erincan. Be prepared for some narly turns on four wheels!

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #21: Škoda Titan Desert Series - Morocco
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesport and the mystic deserts of Morocco, where Athletes are not only fighting nature, but also one of the hardest racetracks on the planet. The dunes… The navigation…. The suffering… The legend…. The desert! The Skoda Titan Desert Morocco.

programme.title: Perspectives
programme.desc: In Perspectives we take a look at a little-known young French surfer, Sacha Fellous and his daring attempt to surf the legendary Nazare spot by paddling. At 18 Sacha is an all-round young athlete, a marine explorer cradled by the exceptional setting of the Basque coast.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Big Air Kite and GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships - Gran Canaria (ESP)
programme.desc: Gran Canaria will host the GKA Big Air Kite World Championships and the GWA Big Air Wingfoil World Championships in July 2024. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the titles and show impressive skills in kiteboarding and wingfoiling.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The worlds best freeriders will compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The first stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 19th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: Swatch Catch The Moment - Profile Kassia Meador
programme.desc: "Catch the Moment" profiles athletes from around the world, including American longboard surfer Kassia Meador. Kassia is constantly exploring new creative endeavors and travels the world for surfing and photography trips.

programme.title: Kald Sòl
programme.desc: The film sheds light on the surprising resources of cold countries, and on the search for waves guided by climatic uncertainties. Samuel Redon, a young professional surfer accustomed to warm-water surfing, is about to discover a whole new world of surfing.

programme.title: Swatch Timeline - This Is My Winter
programme.desc: Experience the mountain with the myth-Xavier De Le Rue. There are so many moments so many adventures so many ways of seeing the mountains. You only need a few magic days to film a part for a snowboard film. But this season it took me six months - so: This is my winter.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 6
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc dAzur, Europes leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: Pierra Menta 2017 - Areches-Beaufort (FRA)
programme.desc: The Pierra Menta is an annual competition of ski mountaineering in the region of Beaufort, Savoie south-eastern France since 1986. It is is one of the three best known races of the Alps .

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp

programme.title: WOF 2024 #22: 4Islands - Croatia

programme.title: A New Evil, Part 1
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! And, as if things couldn’t get any worse, real monsters begin to appear around the world, terrorizing the population!

programme.title: A New Evil, Part 2
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters on the field at once, but each creature receives a power boost!

programme.title: Legend of the Dragons
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse!

programme.title: The Creator Returns
programme.desc: Confusion abound when enemies become friends... and friends become enemies! Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they’re asked for help from a one-eyed former foe!

programme.title: Deja Duel!, Part 1
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Wielding his newest whacked-out Toon terrors, Pegasus is ready to repeat his previous victory against Kaiba!

programme.title: Deja Duel!, Part 2
programme.desc: Not only does Alister’s mighty fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba’s monsters!

programme.title: An Unexpected Enemy
programme.desc: On the way to Industrial Illusions, Yugi and friends are ambushed by a band of motorcycle thugs - until their favorite friend soars to the rescue!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 1
programme.desc: Can this be?! Mai has joined the enemy! Wielding the sinister sorcery of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai unequivocally calculates to trap Joey’s soul for Dartz’s malevolent master plan!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 2
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the arcane abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies into devastating combat formations!

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 3
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer?

programme.title: My Freaky Valentine, Part 3
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer?

programme.title: The Challenge
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world’s chaotic conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and a lost civilization!

programme.title: Fate of the Pharaoh, Part 1
programme.desc: Isolated on a steep mesa in Death Valley, it’s a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his group of guardian monsters!

programme.title: Fate of the Pharaoh, Part 2
programme.desc: Dartz’s master plan is finally revealed, and capturing Yugi’s soul is the catalyst to reset the very essence of history!

programme.title: Fate of the Pharaoh, Part 3
programme.desc: Using the awesome abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael’s guardians into garbage... but he’s also slowly succumbing to the card’s evil influence!

programme.title: Trial by Stone
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi’s soul! Having betrayed his dearest friend, the Pharaoh sinks into the darkest depths of despair and loses his will to save the world!

programme.title: On the Wrong Track, Part 1
programme.desc: Divide and conquer - it’s a train ride to terror! A cross-country expedition turns tragic when Dartz’s new duelists separate Yugi from Joey in order to capture their souls separately!

programme.title: On the Wrong Track, Part 2
programme.desc: While Weevil sneakily infests and genetically manipulates Yugi’s monsters to metamorphose them into crude creepy crawlers, Rex Raptor’s prehistoric predators take a more forceful approach and run roughshod over Joey’s forces!

programme.title: On the Wrong Track, Part 3
programme.desc: Having lost the trust of Timaeus, Yugi can no longer use his guardian dragon against Weevil’s insect invasion!

programme.title: Self Destruction
programme.desc: The train derails and plummets into a chasm, leaving Yugi and Tea totally lost in the Rocky Mountains!

programme.title: Reliving the Past
programme.desc: Weakened by his journey into the dark reaches of his heart, Yugi is in no shape to duel... but Dartz doesn’t care!

programme.title: Deck of Armor
programme.desc: Valon is ready to take on the world and fight... for the heart of Mai? And the first adversaries standing in his way are Duke and Rebecca!

programme.title: Flight of Fear, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane flying at hundreds of miles per hour!

programme.title: Flight of Fear, Part 2
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat, a mechanical menace that’s not only armed with countless cannons but can also summon a battalion of Robot Tokens!

programme.title: Paradise Found
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! The timing couldn’t be any worse - the only supercomputer in the world that can decipher the Atlantean hieroglyphics is housed within the four walls of KaibaCorp!

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 1
programme.desc: Dartz launches the final phase of his plan by having his minions of Orichalcos Soldiers attack all around the world, leaving Yugi and gang with no one left to trust!

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 2
programme.desc: Decked out in high-tech body armor and weapons, Valon is pummeling Joey with punishing punches!

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 3
programme.desc: With his scientifically-advanced armor, Valon systematically dismantles Joey’s every move!

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 4
programme.desc: Joey and Valon’s battle rages as Joey attempts to turn the duel around by augmenting the very same armor that Valon used against him!

programme.title: Fighting for a Friend, Part 5
programme.desc: Broken and battered after his exhausting battle against Valon, Joey can barely stand up, much less duel!

programme.title: Grappling with a Guardian, Part 1
programme.desc: Not only is Joey’s soul captured, but before this episode is over, another of our loved ones will also lose his or her soul!

programme.title: Grappling With a Guardian, Part 2
programme.desc: Rafael, unlike the Pharaoh, fully knows how to harness the powers of Seal of Orichalcos to his advantage to annihilate the Pharaoh while fortifying his own defenses!

programme.title: Grappling With a Guardian, Part 3
programme.desc: From the depths of darkness, Rafael calls forth Guardian Dreadscythe, a ravaging reaper that can never be defeated... for it resurrects automatically!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 1
programme.desc: After discovering the location of Dartz’s base, our heroes are on their way to stop Dartz once and for all –with the entire navy as their escort!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 2
programme.desc: Dartz’s deepest secrets are finally revealed – including the fact that he’s over 10,000 years old!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 3
programme.desc: Dartz plants the souls of our captured heroes into Mirror Knights to use them as puppets to fight the Pharaoh and Kaiba!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 4
programme.desc: It’s a multi-pronged attack as Dartz adds a third ring to Seal of Orichalcos, stopping the Pharaoh and Kaiba from doing... anything!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 5
programme.desc: Kaiba’s soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 6
programme.desc: Dartz calls forth Divine Serpent Geh, a sinister snake with infinite attack points! Yugi counters by joining the three legendary dragon knights into the mighty Timaeus the Knight of Destiny, but is that enough to combat a monster with limitless strength?

programme.title: Now or Never: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite and Quinton team up to swat down the bug-eyed Barian Scritch! But when Kite starts hallucinating, Quinton must fend off their flying foe while simultaneously steering clear of his confused partner’s attacks!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s mission to find Astral turns into a high-stakes race against time when Yuma learns the Guardian of Astral World plans to erase his best friend from existence!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma faces his toughest challenge yet when he battles against an opponent who can draw the exact card he needs every turn!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 3
programme.desc: Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose! Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 4
programme.desc: With Astral’s fate hanging in the balance, the heart-pounding battle between Yuma and Astral World’s Guardian thunders to its frenzied finish!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 1
programme.desc: To get a lead on Yuma and his buddies, Vector bombards Earth with bogus Numbers. When one of them takes the bait, it puts Mr. Heartland and his sinister swarm of insect monsters hot on the gang’s heels!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 2
programme.desc: With Kite grounded, Yuma and Astral step up to take the buzzing Barian, Mr. Heartland down! Can our heroes repel this pest, or will they end up getting squashed instead?

programme.title: Battle with the Barians
programme.desc: When all seven Barian Emperors ambush Yuma, some friendly faces drop in to help take the Barians out!

programme.title: Fight for a Friend
programme.desc: Quattro faces off against the Barian leader, Nash! Hoping to find Shark swimming just beneath his new Barian identity, Quattro looks to hook his old friend and reel him back in!

programme.title: Farewell for a Friend
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Nash and Quattro comes to a climactic conclusion! Will this battle lure the real Shark out from inside his Barian form, or will it cost Quattro much more than he ever could have imagined?

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 1
programme.desc: Looking to get revenge for their brother Quattro, Trey and Quinton team up to take down the treacherous Barian, Mizar!

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 2
programme.desc: As Quinton and Treys devastating double duel against Mizar flares to a feverish finish, the brothers reveal the real reason they are battling the Barian! Their startling secret hits Mizar harder than any attack!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 5
programme.desc: Kaiba’s soul has been captured, leaving the Pharaoh all alone to fend for himself against the invincible forces of Dartz and the Orichalcos!

programme.title: A Duel With Dartz!, Part 6
programme.desc: Dartz calls forth Divine Serpent Geh, a sinister snake with infinite attack points! Yugi counters by joining the three legendary dragon knights into the mighty Timaeus the Knight of Destiny, but is that enough to combat a monster with limitless strength?

programme.title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 1
programme.desc: All the monsters of Earth join forces with the survivors of the monster domain for an epic showdown with the fate of both worlds hanging in the balance!

programme.title: Rise of the Great Beast, Part 2
programme.desc: Grand Dragon Leviathan’s thunderous roars unleash hundred-foot tall waves worldwide to destroy every town and city on Earthy!

programme.title: Unwanted Guest, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang have saved the world from Dartz and his Grand Dragon Leviathan, but they’re about to face their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Unwanted Guest, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi is trapped inside the Duel Dome, and the only way to escape is by defeating the Duel Computer!

programme.title: Let the Games Begin!, Part 1
programme.desc: Sixteen of the world’s greatest duelists are all vying for a chance to challenge Yugi as the King of Games!

programme.title: Let the Games Begin!, Part 2
programme.desc: Mysteries abound! How does Apdnarg Otum know all of Joey’s strategies?

programme.title: Childs Play
programme.desc: It’s the second match of the KC Grand Championship as Rebecca faces the kung-fu kicking Asia champion Vivian Wong!

programme.title: Down in Flames, Part 1
programme.desc: The first round is over, leaving eight duelists to compete for the right to face Yugi for the KC Grand Championship!

programme.title: Down in Flames, Part 2
programme.desc: Zigfried activates Ride of the Valkyries, the same card that defeated both Weevil and Rex Raptor at the same time!

programme.title: A Brawl in a Small Town, Part 1
programme.desc: In the semifinals of the KC Grand Championship, it’s a duel between child prodigies as Rebecca faces Leon Wilson and his fairy tale faction!

programme.title: A Brawl in a Small Town, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi finds Grandpa’s kidnapper, but is it really a kidnapping? The truth is painful – literally!

programme.title: One Step Ahead, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s Zigfried vs. Leon for the right to challenge Yugi in the KC Grand Championship Finals... but Kaiba stops the duel!

programme.title: One Step Ahead, Part 2
programme.desc: It’s a battle between Zigfried’s Valkyries and Kaiba’s Blue-Eyes White Dragon!

programme.title: Sinister Secrets, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! t to commence as his real master plan is unleashed!

programme.title: Sinister Secrets, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! t to commence as his real master plan is unleashed!

programme.title: Sinister Secrets, Part 1
programme.desc: It’s Yugi vs. Leon for the title of King of Games at the KC Grand Championship! t to commence as his real master plan is unleashed!

programme.title: Sinister Secrets, Part 2
programme.desc: Leon is Zigfried’s younger brother, and he’ll avenge his family’s loss!

programme.title: Sinister Secrets, Part 3
programme.desc: Golden Castle of Stromberg is infecting the world’s Duel Disks with a virus that will destroy KaibaCorp!

programme.title: Getting Played
programme.desc: What starts out as a typical day at Domino High School turns out to be anything but typical.

programme.title: Divide and Conquer
programme.desc: Realizing that they’ve become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Reunited at Last
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice.

programme.title: Fortress of Fear
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the “Fortress of Fear.”

programme.title: Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests known as the Five Sacred Trials.

programme.title: Trial of Light and Shadow
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island.

programme.title: Red-Eyes Black Curse
programme.desc: It’s on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland.

programme.title: Fruit of Evolution
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task – locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: The Fiendish Five, Part 1
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five.

programme.title: The Fiendish Five, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think! These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: The True King, Part 1
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come.

programme.title: The True King, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi’s friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Tomb of the Nameless Pharaoh
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil and treachery he faced to find the artifact!

programme.title: Spiritual Awakening
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, yearning and prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game!

programme.title: Memoirs of a Pharaoh
programme.desc: Yugi and friends are going to the dawn of the duel, to the land where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh’s mysteries lie: Egypt!

programme.title: The Intruder, Part 1
programme.desc: The fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh’s palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: The Intruder, Part 2
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn’t prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping!

programme.title: Makings of a Magician
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura’s sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can’t keep!

programme.title: Birth of the Blue-Eyes
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh’s guardians, has fallen!

programme.title: Village of Lost Souls
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created?

programme.title: A Reversal of Fortune
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura’s Diabound.

programme.title: In Search of a King
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss.

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle!

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 2
programme.desc: It’s the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh.

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 3
programme.desc: With the help of his father’s spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated Bakura’s Diabound and stopped Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Fists of Fury: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma and Astrals race to face Don Thousand is stopped cold by the hot-blooded Alito, now brainwashed by the Barian deity! Can they think fast enough to free Alito of Don Thousand, or will he take the two down for the count?!

programme.title: Fists of Fury: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Astral duel desperately to try and turn an old enemy into their newest ally, but with Don Thousand in Alito’s corner, Yuma and Astral find themselves up against the ropes!

programme.title: Power Play
programme.desc: Vector sets his sights on squashing Marin and Dumon, and there’s nothing Shark can do but watch his sister and best friend squirm before his eyes.

programme.title: Barian vs. Barian
programme.desc: The thunderous battle between Marin, Dumon and Vector shatters expectations as it nears its startling end! Meanwhile, Alito stands tall against his former friend, the Barian behemoth - Girag!

programme.title: Vector the Victor
programme.desc: Marins duel with Vector charges to its climactic conclusion! Can Marin outduel this venomous villain, or will Vector remain invincible?!

programme.title: Dragon Strife: Part 1
programme.desc: The long foreshadowed faceoff is finally here! Kite and Mizar go toe-to-toe to settle who is the one true Galaxy-Eyes master!

programme.title: Dragon Strife: Part 2
programme.desc: The fierce face-off between Kite and Mizar soars to new heights as their battle to determine the one true Galaxy-Eyes master roars to a finish!

programme.title: The Forsaken Palace
programme.desc: Nash races to face Vector, but with Vectors enhanced strength, he may be speeding towards his own demise!

programme.title: Clash of the Emperors
programme.desc: While Nash and Vectors danger-fueled duel hits dizzying new heights of havoc, the truth behind Vector’s dark past is revealed!

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: Yuma teams up with an unlikely ally to take down the great Barian deity, Don Thousand! Can this twosome draw out a victory, or will Don Thousand douse any hope these heroes have of being victorious?

programme.title: The Source Code
programme.desc: Yuma and Shark’s battle with Don Thousand takes a treacherous turn when the great Barian deity reveals he can rewrite their cards into entirely different cards! Can Yuma and Shark defeat a foe who can change their every move?

programme.title: A Thousand Ways to Lose
programme.desc: Yuma and Shark turn the tides and put Don Thousand on the brink of defeat, but DonThousand still has a thousand tricks up his sleeve!

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 2
programme.desc: It’s the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh.

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 3
programme.desc: With the help of his father’s spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated Bakura’s Diabound and stopped Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 4
programme.desc: The secret is out! The Pharaoh’s journey was more than a trip to the past – it’s the greatest Shadow Game ever created!

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 5
programme.desc: Zorc’s incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound!

programme.title: Name of the Game
programme.desc: Karim is the next to fall under the bandit Bakura’s assault, and the ravaging robber won’t stop until he conquers the rest!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 1
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 2
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 3
programme.desc: Even Exodia the Forbidden One was unable to defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 4
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated!

programme.title: In the Name of the Pharaoh
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba’s combined strength couldn’t defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Final Journey
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel... Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: The time of destiny is now! Yugi vs. Atem!

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E73 Jodha Akbar S3 E73
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E280 King of Hearts S1 E280
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E280 Second Chances S1 E280
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E74 Jodha Akbar S3 E74
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E280 This is Fate S1 E280
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E280 Undercover Love S1 E280
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dhamaal
programme.desc: Dhamaal is a 2007 comedy film featuring four quirky, unemployed friends—Roy, Adi, Manav, and Boman—who stumble upon a dying mans secret about a hidden treasure in Goa. Eager to change their fortunes, they set off on a wild, chaotic journey to find it. Along the way, they encounter hilarious challenges and absurd situations. However, they aren’t alone in the race—Inspector Kabir, a greedy cop, is also after the treasure and determined to beat them to it. What follows is a madcap adventure full of gags, misadventures, and comic twists as everyone scrambles to strike it rich.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Double Dhamaal
programme.desc: Four men - Aditya, Boman, Manav, and Deshbandhu - are broke after losing money to officer Kabir Nayak. Learning of Kabirs affair with Gulabo, they plan to blackmail him. Enlisting gangster-turned-Sadhu Bata Bhai, they fail and flee to Macau. There, they encounter Kabir, now a casino owner, and plot their revenge.
